card_text: Independent: Vlad can play and use cards requiring a title or a sect as if he had that title or were of that sect. +1 bleed.

text: When playing a card requiring a title or a sect, he is treated as a such for all effects of the card, including duration effects. (eg. he can {Archon} himself and use its effect later) [ANK 20201028] [ANK 20190228] [LSJ 20101013]

He can use a card in play as if he had a title or a sect, but cannot use it if it would provide unrequired stealth or intercept (eg. he cannot use {No Secrets From the Magaji} to attempt to block a vampire acting with no stealth). [ANK 20180403]
His ability do not let him fulfill card requirements if they are not played normally, like when using {Piper} to recruit an ally. [LSJ 20050119]
When meeting a title requirement, he is considered as a vampire of the underlying sect. [LSJ 20050128]
When meeting a requirement, the controller can choose how he meets it (eg. he can play {Anarch Secession} as a Prince of any city, even a made-up one). [PIB 20150306] [PIB 20150307]
He can use a card requiring a sect or titled to be played (eg. use {Abbot} intercept bonus as a Sabbat vampire, perform {Archon} action to burn it as a Prince or Justicar). [PIB 20150306]

He cannot use a card as a vampire of a sect or with a title if the card does not require the sect or title to be played. (eg. he cannot benefit from {Powerbase: Madrid} as a Sabbat vampire) [PIB 20150306]

name: Vlad Tepes

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Hunt at +4 hunt. After successful resolution, a referendum is called to call a blood hunt on this vampire (independent of the action, just as if they had committed diablerie).

text: "Successful resolution" means the action must not be blocked and the vampire must have gained blood. If the vampire cannot gain blood (eg., {Vampiric Disease}, {Ex Nihilo}), the blood hunt is not called even if the action is not blocked. [LSJ 20090411]
This is not a diablerie. Neither {Rebirth} nor {Carlton Van Wyk}'s ability can be used. [LSJ 20090724] [ANK 20180129-1]
The Blood Hunt referendum is still a Blood Hunt: {Lay Low} can be used, {Trophy: Diablerie} would prevent the referendum. [LSJ 20091026] [LSJ 20100112]

The Blood Hunt referendum is part of the action resolution. Cards that are played "after a successful action" or "after resolution" must be played after the referendum. {Heidelberg Castle, Germany} can not be used before the referendum. [LSJ 20100112] [PIB 20121028]

text: Cannot be played when burned as a result of a Blood Hunt referendum. [LSJ 20070417]

Move up to 4 blood from the acting vampire to this vampire. This vampire gets an additional strike (limited) each round and an optional maneuver each combat. He may enter combat with a ready minion as a Ⓓ action.

If moved to the uncontrolled region (eg. by {Banishment}), it continues to be a vampire and can be influenced. [RTR 19990712]

card_text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until a Methuselah is ousted.
Requires at least one other Gehenna card in play. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, he or she may put the top card of his or her library in play. That card represents a nameless, textless ghoul ally with 2 life, 2 strength and 1 bleed. If the ally is burned, it is removed from the game. When a Methuselah is ousted, burn this card. Remove all such allies from the game when this card leaves play.

text: Putting the top card of your library in play as a ghoul does not count as playing the card. [LSJ 20040531]
The card used to represent the ally is face up, but the name on that card is ignored if something goes looking for a card by name. They do not contest. [LSJ 20040623] [LSJ 20071003]
A burned ghoul is removed from the game but is still burned first, triggering cards such as {Tension in the Ranks}. [LSJ 20090920]
The Ghouls are not mortal, they are monsters. [ANK 20200203-2]
Is not replaced until the condition is met, even if it is burned. [LSJ 20080805]
The "other Gehenna cards in play" requirement is only checked when playing the card. [PIB 20121031]

text: The action has reached resolution, so is subject to NRA (Non Repeatable Action) rules. [LSJ 20070709]

Actions without card (provided by the rulebook) can be repeated if they have different targets. Equipping from a minion targets the equipments: if one equipment is the same, the action is the same. [RTR 19950509] [LSJ 20080710] [ANK 20200502]
Actions provided by cards in play are not the same if the card is not the same, even if the cards have the same name. [LSJ 20080725]
Is played after a minion successfully blocks but before the blocker is locked and combat begins. It cannot be used if the action is ended without being blocked. [LSJ 19980224] [RTR 19991206]

No other modifier can be played afterwards: the action is ended, it cannot be modified anymore. [LSJ 20010803-1] [RTR 20180719]
If the acting minion was performing a mandatory action, he unlocks and is stuck and cannot act: he should but cannot take the mandatory action. [LSJ 19980112]

You may lock this card to give a Malkavian you control +X stealth until the end of the turn, where X is the amount of blood the Malkavian burns. You may only increase your stealth to 1 greater than the blocking minion's current intercept. Any minion can burn this location as a Ⓓ action.

text: May be used anytime it is unlocked, even if it has been used previously during the same action (it must be unlocked by some method, of course). [TOM 19960109]

name: Forest of Shadows

card_text:
Only usable when an action to equip a non-unique melee weapon from your hand is successful.
[pot] Put this card on the weapon. This weapon inflicts +1 damage each strike.
[POT] As above, and the cost of this weapon is reduced by 1 blood or 1 pool.

text: Additional damage inherits all of the properties of the base damage. [TOM 19960225]

name: Forger's Hammer

card_text:
Requires a ready vampire with capacity 5 or more.
Ⓓ Bleed. If the bleed is successful, this acting vampire gains 1 blood.
name: Forgery

card_text:
Not usable on a bleed action.
[obf] +2 stealth.
[OBF] +3 stealth.
flavor_text:
I fled Him down the nights and down the days
I fled Him down the arches of the years,
I fled Him down the labyrinthine ways...
Francis Thompson, "The Hound of Heaven"
name: Forgotten Labyrinth

fr.name: Forme de corruption
fr.card_text:
[ser] Mettez cette carte en jeu. Si votre proie reçoit à nouveau l'Avantage, vous pouvez ajouter 1 compteur à cette carte. Si le nombre de compteurs sur cette carte égale ou dépasse la quantité de points de sang sur un vampire contrôlé par votre proie durant votre phase de maître, vous pouvez brûler cette carte pour voler ce vampire. Un Mathusalem ne peut en avoir qu'un seul exemplaire.
[SER] Comme ci-dessus et votre proie brûle 1 point de réserve après que vous brûlez cette carte.

es.name: Forma de corrupción
es.card_text:
[ser] Pon esta carta en juego. Cada vez que tu presa obtenga la Ventaja, añade 1 ficha a esta carta. Si el número de fichas de esta carta iguala o supera la cantidad de sangre de un vampiro controlado por tu presa durante tu fase heril, puedes quemar esta carta para robar ese vampiro. Un Matusalén puede tener sólo una /Forma de corrupción/.
[SER] Como antes, y tu presa quema 1 de reserva sanguínea después de que quemes esta carta.

card_text:
[ser] Put this card in play. If your prey gets the Edge anew, add 1 counter on this card. If the number of counters on this card equals or exceeds the amount of blood on a vampire controlled by your prey during your master phase, you can burn this card to steal that vampire. A Methuselah can have only one Form of Corruption.
[SER] As above, and your prey burns 1 pool after you burn this card.
name: Form of Corruption

fr.name: Forme de brume
fr.card_text:
[pro] Frapper : esquiver.
[PRO] Frapper : fin de combat. Si ce vampire agit et que l'action a été bloquée, il peut brûler 1 point de sang après la fin du combat pour continuer l'action avec +1 en discrétion comme si elle n'avait pas été bloquée, même si de la discrétion n'est pas encore nécessaire. Un vampire ne peut en jouer qu'un seul exemplaire au niveau supérieur par action.
fr.flavor_text:
Et pourtant je suis et je vis — ballotté, vaporeux.
John Clare, "Je suis"

es.name: Forma de niebla
es.card_text:
[pro] Ataque: esquiva.
[PRO] Ataque: el combate termina. Si este vampiro está actuando y la acción fue bloqueada, puede quemar 1 de sangre después de que termine el combate para continuar la acción con +1 de sigilo como si no hubiera sido bloqueada, aunque el sigilo no sea necesario. Un vampiro puede jugar sólo un ejemplar de esta carta a superior por acción.
es.flavor_text:
Y sin embargo soy, semejante a vapores.
John Clare, "Yo soy"

card_text:
[pro] Strike: dodge.
[PRO] Strike: combat ends. If this vampire is acting and the action was blocked, they can burn 1 blood after combat ends to continue the action at +1 stealth as if unblocked, even if stealth is not yet needed. A vampire can play only one Form of Mist at superior each action.
flavor_text:
...and yet I am, and live, like vapours tossed.
John Clare, "I Am"

text: [PRO] If the action continues "as if unblocked", all action modifiers and reaction cards are still in effect, even those pertaining to a successful block. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20190116]
[PRO] If the action continues "as if unblocked", Methusalah that had declined to block before do not get another opportunity to block. [ANK 20190116]
[PRO] An action cannot continue "as if unblocked" after a combat resulting from a successful action. [RTR 19970630]

[PRO] "continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the action card is not in the ash heap, then the action cannot be continued. [LSJ 20070808-1]
[PRO] If the combat continues or a new combat begins, the "action continues as if unblocked" effect is lost and the blood is not paid. [LSJ 19980109] [RTR 20020501] [LSJ 20031123]

name: Form of Mist

card_text:
[pro] Maneuver.
[PRO] Press.
flavor_text:
Nobody knows where I was,
and now I am no longer there.
Gwendolyn Brooks, "Boy Breaking Glass"
name: Form of the Ghost

card_text:
[ser] +1 stealth.
[SER] Maneuver.
flavor_text:
Dear indolent, I love to see
In your body bright
How shimmering like silk the skin
Reflects the light!
Baudelaire, "The Dancing Serpent"
name: Form of the Serpent

card_text:
Master: Discipline.
Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gains 1 level of Fortitude [for]. Capacity increases by 1: the vampire is one generation older. Cannot be placed on a vampire with superior Fortitude [FOR].
name: Fortitude

card_text:
Master.
Search your library for a Gehenna event card. Show it to all players and add it to your hand. Discard down to your hand size afterward. Only one Fortschritt Library may be played per game.
flavor_text:
Our diviners find signs and portents everywhere they look. The Red Star burns.
Etrius' journal
name: Fortschritt Library

card_text:
Mortal with 1 life.
During your minion phase, you may look at one card picked at random from your prey's hand.
flavor_text:
Women excel in the manifestation of certain qualities which are associated with mystery...
Charles Godfrey Leland, "Gypsy Sorcery and Fortune Telling"
name: Fortune Teller

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock to give a Ravnos +1 stealth for the current action.
name: Fortune Teller Shop

card_text:
Only usable if a vampire would successfully hunt.
[qui] The acting vampire gets -1 hunt and takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage. Lock this reacting vampire.
[QUI] As above, but do not lock this reacting vampire.

text: A hunt is not successful if no blood is gained, even if the hunt action is still successful. [LSJ 20050720-2]

name: Foul Blood

fr.name: Exposition de la fondation
fr.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Chaque Toréador antitribu non titré que vous contrôlez reçoit +1 voix. N'importe quel vampire peut brûler cette carte en action Ⓓ qui coûte 1 point de sang.
fr.flavor_text:
C'est une sorte de torture que de regarder ce spectacle.
Waldorf, Toreador antitribu

es.name: Exposición de la Fundación
es.card_text:
Lugar único.
Cada Toreador antitribu no titulado que controles consigue +1 voto. Cualquier vampiro puede quemar esta carta con una acción Ⓓ que cuesta 1 de sangre.
es.flavor_text:
Es como una tortura tener que ver el espectáculo.
Waldorf, Toreador antitribu

card_text:
Unique location.
Each non-titled Toreador antitribu you control gets +1 vote. Any vampire can burn this card as a Ⓓ action that costs 1 blood.
flavor_text:
It's like a kind of torture to have to watch the show.
Waldorf, Toreador antitribu
name: Foundation Exhibit

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card on a younger Laibon in your uncontrolled region and move 4 blood from the blood bank to that vampire. (This card remains in play.) A vampire may have only one Founders of the Ebony Kingdom. Burn this card if the vampire leaves the uncontrolled region.
name: Founders of the Ebony Kingdom

card_text:
Event.
Requires at least two Gehenna cards in play. When this card is played, burn all Gehenna cards and conviction [1 CONVICTION] cards, then send all vampires with capacity 3 or less to torpor. No Gehenna cards may be played while this card remains in play.
name: The Fourth Cycle

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready prince or justicar.
Move 3 blood from the blood bank to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region.
flavor_text: Those thou dost create are thine own children.
name: Fourth Tradition: The Accounting

card_text:
[cel] X is 0. Strike: dodge.
[str] This vampire gets X additional strikes (limited) each round. Those additional strikes can only be hand strikes. [str] is not a Discipline.
[STR] As [str] above, and this vampire gets +1 strength for the remainder of this combat.
name: Fractura

card_text:
[pot] Strike: destroy equipment.
[POT] As above, with 1 damage.

[POT] Is a damaging strike. [LSJ 19970225]

_name: Fragment of the Book of Nod
card_text:

Put this card in play. Lock to draw 2 cards from your library (discard afterward). Any vampire can take control of the Fragment for his or her controller as a Ⓓ action.

name: Fragment of the Book of Nod

+1 stealth action. Requires an anarch.

card_text:
Master.
Choose a prince or primogen, or burn 3 pool to choose a justicar. The chosen vampire loses his or her title.

Seulement utilisable après résolution de l'action.
[for] Seulement utilisable si l'action a été réussie. Redressez ce vampire.
[FOR] Seulement utilisable si l'action a été bloquée. Redressez ce vampire.

es.name: Impulso sobrenatural
es.card_text:
Sólo utilizable tras la resolución de la acción.
[for] Sólo utilizable si la acción tuvo éxito. Endereza a este vampiro.
[FOR] Sólo utilizable si la acción fue bloqueada. Endereza a este vampiro.

card_text:
Only usable after action resolution.
[for] Only usable if the action was successful. Unlock this vampire.
[FOR] Only usable if the action was blocked. Unlock this vampire.

text: [FOR] Is played after all combats are handled. Can be played from torpor. [RTR 19980623] [LSJ 20030103] [ANK 20180906]
[for] Can be played if the action is unblocked even if it has no effect due to lack of a suitable target. [LSJ 20070411]
[for] Is played after the action resolves. (eg. if played after equipping {Learjet}, you draw an additional card). [PIB 20150915]
Is played after resolution, but still during the action. Action modifiers and effects that can be played "after resolution" can be played after it. [LSJ 19981028] [ANK 20190425]

name: Freak Drive

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined.
[san] Lock this Blood Brother and any number of ready unlocked members you control of this circle. Once each round before range is determined, or whenever your combatant leaves the ready region, you may choose one of these ready Blood Brothers to become the combatant instead (and combat continues).
[SAN] As above, and each of these Blood Brothers gets an optional press this combat.

text: A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. Vampires with the same name (eg. {The Embrace}, non-unique vampires) do not share a circle by default, each has his own circle of one by default. [LSJ 20020609]

name: Free Fight

card_text:
Requires an Independent or Anarch vampire.
Allocate X points among one or more ready vampires, where X is half the capacity of the acting vampire (rounded up). No more than 3 points points can be allocated to each vampire. Successful referendum means each vampire burns 1 blood for each point allocated. In this referendum, non-priscus titles are worth 1 less vote each, priscus title is worth 1 less ballot, and burning the Edge is worth 1 additional vote.

text: If there are insuffient targets to which to allocate all of the points allowed, then the card cannot be played. [LSJ 20010810]
The votes provided by the Priscii sub-referendum are not affected. [ANK 20180307-1]

name: Free States Rant

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn. Frenzy.
Only usable before range is chosen. Choose a vampire in combat. In this round, that vampire cannot use equipment and cannot use presses to end combat. This round has a press, only usable to continue combat.

text: Only prevents the use of equipment after it is played - it will not cancel the effects of equipment used before it is played. [TOM 19960326]

name: Frenzy

card_text:
Requires a ready anarch.
[for] Reduce a bleed against you by 2.
[nec] +1 intercept.
[obt] Only usable when a vampire successfully bleeds you. The acting vampire burns 2 blood.

card_text:
Master.
Take control of a minion controlled by a Methuselah with 3 or fewer pool. Not usable to take control of a vampire with capacity 7 or more. Only one From a Sinking Ship can be played in a game.
flavor_text:
This is not what I signed up for.
Theo Bell, Brujah archon.

text: Requirements do not apply when taking control of a card already in play. [TOM 19960226-1]

name: From a Sinking Ship

fr.name: Assaut frontal
fr.card_text: Mettez cette carte en jeu. Chaque serviteur disponible que vous contrôlez peut entrer en combat contre un serviteur contrôlé par votre proie en action Ⓓ. Vous gagnez 1 point de réserve après qu'un serviteur disponible contrôlé par votre proie est brûlé ou envoyé en torpeur. Durant votre phase d'influence, brûlez cette carte et brûlez 1 point de réserve pour chaque serviteur disponible contrôlé par votre proie.

es.name: Asalto frontal
es.card_text: Pon esta carta en juego. Cada siervo preparado que controles puede entrar en combate con un siervo controlado por tu presa con una acción Ⓓ. Ganas 1 de reserva sanguínea después de que un siervo controlado por tu presa sea quemado o enviado al letargo. Durante tu fase de influencia, quema esta carta y quema 1 de reserva sanguínea por cada siervo preparado controlado por tu presa.

card_text: Put this card in play. Each ready minion you control can enter combat with a minion controlled by your prey as a Ⓓ action. You gain 1 pool after a ready minion controlled by your prey is burned or sent to torpor. During your influence phase, burn this card and burn 1 pool for each ready minion controlled by your prey.

card_text:
+1 stealth action. A Methuselah can have only one Frozen Object in play.
[ser] Ⓓ Look at a Methuselah's hand and burn all equipment cards found there.
[tem] Put this card on the acting vampire. If this vampire successfully blocks a Ⓓ action, you may burn this card to do 2 unpreventable damage to the acting minion before combat begins.
[TEM] Put this card in play. You may burn this card when a bleed against you is successful to do 2 unpreventable damage to the acting minion (inflicted after the action is complete).
name: Frozen Object

card_text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until a vampire commits diablerie.
Put 10 counters on this card. Remove one counter each time another Gehenna card is put in play. A blood hunt cannot be called on a vampire whose capacity is greater than the number of counters on this card when he or she diablerizes a younger vampire.
flavor_text:
I'm starting to hear whispers of warehouses and old office buildings converted to internment centers -- and buffets.
Okulos, Nosferatu

text: Is not replaced until the condition is met, even if it is burned. [LSJ 20080805]

name: Fueled by Heart's Blood

card_text:
Usable by a locked vampire.
[nec] Unlock a mummy, wraith, or zombie ally you control.
[NEC] Unlock up to two mummy, wraith, or zombie allies you control.
name: Funeral Wake

card_text:
Master. Trifle.
Put this card on a ready non-titled, non-Anarch vampire you control. The vampire with this card is considered Anarch. If this vampire changes sects, burn this card.
flavor_text:
The neonate childe escaped. So intent on Galaric were the Ventrue that they ignored the childe until he was long gone from their grasp.
Salvador Garcia, Brujah anarch

text: Is a change of the actual sect. A temporary effect overriding the sect has precendence and if it does, this card burns (eg. {Writ of Acceptance}). [LSJ 20100811]

If the target changes sect to a sect inappropriate for his title, he loses its benefit until his sect is appropriate. He immediately yields the title if it is contested or he receives a new one. [LSJ 20060904]

name: Galaric's Legacy

card_text:
Master.
Only usable if you have at least 1 victory point. Lose 1 victory point and put this card in play. During your unlock phase, move 1 pool from your prey's pool to your pool. If you are ousted, your predator gains an additional victory point. At the end of the game, if you have not been ousted, you gain an additional victory point.

text: If the controller of a Gambit in play withdraws, his or her predator gets a VP from the Gambit (the Methuselah who withdraws still gets a VP for withdrawing, of course). [RTR 20040501]

name: Gambit Accepted

fr.name: Jeu de Malkav
fr.card_text: Chaque autre Mathusalem choisit en secret un nombre entre 1 et 5 inclus ; vous choisissez un nombre entre 1 et 6 inclus. Chaque Mathusalem tend sa main avec le nombre choisi de compteurs dedans. Révélez les choix simultanément. Chaque Mathusalem gagne la quantité de points de réserve qu'il a choisie sauf si un autre Mathusalem a choisi exactement 1 de moins que lui, auquel cas il brûle cette quantité de points de réserve à la place.

es.name: Juego de Malkav
es.card_text: Cada uno de los demás Matusalenes elige en secreto un número entre 1 y 5 inclusive; tú eliges un número entre 1 y 6 inclusive. Cada Matusalén extiende el puño cerrado con el número de fichas elegido dentro. Revela las elecciones simultáneamente. Cada Matusalén gana la cantidad de reserva sanguínea que haya elegido, a no ser que otro Matusalén haya elegido exactamente una ficha menos que él, en cuyo caso, quema esa cantidad de reserva sanguínea en vez de ganarla.

card_text: Each other Methuselah secretly chooses a number between 1 and 5 inclusive; you choose a number between 1 and 6 inclusive. Each Methuselah holds a hand out with the chosen number of counters in it. Reveal the choices simultaneously. Each Methuselah gains the amount of pool they chose unless another Methuselah chose exactly 1 less than they did, in which case, they burn that amount of pool instead.
name: Game of Malkav

card_text:
Requires a ready Sabbat vampire.
Ⓓ Enter combat with an older vampire controlled by another Methuselah. At the end of that combat, if only one combatant is ready, that ready vampire gains blood equal to the opposing vampire's capacity from the blood bank.
flavor_text:
Is this why you arranged for us to be alone together? So you could try to 'talk sense' into me? Or were you just feeling suicidal?
Tara, Brujah Prince of San Diego

text: The gain blood effect is applied after combats ends, no combat card can be played afterwards. The acting player chooses the order of after-combat effects. [LSJ 20100324]

name: Games of Instinct

card_text:
Only usable when the action is announced.
If the action is blocked, the resulting combat is at close range. Other effects cannot change this; skip the determine range step during that combat.
flavor_text:
He who is skilled in the attack flashes forth from the topmost heights of heaven, making it impossible for the enemy to guard against him.
Sun Tzu, "The Art of War"

text: Cards and effects that can be played "as the action is announced" can be played before it. [ANK 20190425]
Cards and effects that are played "as the card is played" must be played before it. Wake effects can be played before it. [ANK 20181208]
Replace the action card (if any) before playing it. [ANK 20181208]

name: Gang Tactics

card_text:
Master: unique location.
During your influence phase, lock to move 1 blood from the blood bank to a Brujah antitribu in your uncontrolled region.

Master.
Put this card on a Gangrel. This vampire gets -1 bleed.

flavor_text:
In America there are factions, but no conspiracies.
Alexis de Tocqueville, "Democracy in America"

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Each Gangrel you control gets +1 strength. This card may be burned by any minion who is not Ravnos as a Ⓓ action.

card_text:
Ally with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed.
Gargoyle Slave cannot use ranged weapons. Gargoyle may prevent one damage each combat. If Gargoyle has less than 3 life, he or she can gain one life as a +1 stealth action.

text: Does not count as a "slave" nor as a "Gargoyle" for game purposes. He is just an ally. [LSJ 20011210-4]

name: Gargoyle Slave

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock and burn 1 pool during your unlock phase to exchange a card in your ash heap that requires an anarch for a card from your hand. Lock before range is determined to end combat between an anarch you control and another anarch.

card_text:
Melee weapon.
Strike: strength damage, only usable at close range. If the opposing vampire would go to torpor during the strike resolution step of this strike and the bearer remains ready, the bearer may burn this card to burn the opposing vampire instead. This is not considered diablerie.

card_text:
Melee weapon.
3 damage each strike. This weapon is only usable once each combat.

[nec] Move a card from your ash heap to your hand.

[vic] This anarch gets +1 strength until your next unlock phase.

[obf] Strike: dodge, with an optional maneuver.

Choose X ready Blood Brothers you control who belong to the same circle as this reacting vampire (including this vampire). Each chosen vampire must burn a blood, or this card has no effect.
[san] +X intercept.

text: A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. Vampires with the same name (eg. {The Embrace}, non-unique vampires) do not share a circle by default, each has his own circle of one by default. [LSJ 20020609]

+1 stealth hunt action.

text: The Ghoul is never the "bearer" of the weapon that it uses. Any side-effect of using the weapon is applied to the employing minion, as normal. [TOM 19951114]
Is not mortal, is a monster. [ANK 20200203-2]

name: Ghoul Retainer

card_text:
Only usable when the action to recruit a mortal ally is announced.
If this action is successful, put this card on that ally and add 1 additional life to the ally from the blood bank. This ally is considered a ghoul and not a mortal. Once each combat, this ally can play a strike card that requires basic Potence [pot] as a vampire.

text: The ally is recruited as a mortal and changed to a ghoul afterwards (eg. {Sunset Strip, Hollywood} can be used to reduce its cost). His "starting life" is still the base mortal amount. [LSJ 20030520-2]
Cards and effects that can be played "as the action is announced" can be played before it. [ANK 20190425]
Cards and effects that are played "as the card is played" must be played before it. Wake effects can be played before it. [ANK 20181208]
Replace the action card (if any) before playing it. [ANK 20181208]

Ghoul with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
Ghouled Street Thug may strike for 1R damage. Ghouled Street Thug may play cards requiring basic Potence [pot] as a vampire with a capacity of 2. If a card would give him blood, give him life instead.

text: Is not mortal, is a monster. [ANK 20200203-2] [LSJ 20060515]
If it uses its last life to play an action modifier, the action fails. If it uses its last life to play a strike, combat ends before strike resolution. [ANK 20180928-1]

Este vampiro obtiene Potencia superior [POT]. Este vampiro puede pasar a un vampiro de tu montón de ceniza a tu zona incontrolada con una acción.

card_text:
Unique.
This vampire gets superior Potence [POT]. This vampire can move a vampire from your ash heap to your uncontrolled region as an action.

text: The minion cannot use the discipline provided if some effect prevents him to use the equipment (eg. {Drawing Out the Beast}). [RTR 20010710]

name: Hand of Conrad

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Play during your influence phase. No Choir cards are burned during this influence phase. Not usable if you played a Hanging Fermata during your last turn.
flavor_text:
If music be the food of love, play on;
Give me excess of it, that, surfeiting,
The appetite may sicken, and so die.
William Shakespeare, "Twelfth Night", act I, scene 1
name: Hanging Fermata

card_text:
Contract. Trifle.
Lock a ready Independent or Anarch Assamite you control to put this card on a younger vampire. Every Independent or Anarch Assamite is considered chosen for this contract. Any Independent or Anarch Assamite can enter combat with the attached vampire as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.

text: The provided action is considered as an action that requires an Anarch or an Independant. (eg {CrimethInc.} can be used). [ANK 20180529]

name: Haqim's Law: Judgment

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Each Methuselah who controls any of the oldest ready Assamites gains 2 pool.
flavor_text:
Leadership is an action, not a position.
Donald H. McGannon
name: Haqim's Law: Leadership

fr.name: Harceler
fr.card_text: Ⓓ Entrer en combat contre un vampire qui a 3 points de sang ou moins ou avec un serviteur incliné. Le serviteur qui agit reçoit 1 poursuite optionnelle, seulement utilisable pour continuer le combat, durant ce combat.

es.name: Hostigar
es.card_text: Ⓓ Entra en combate con un vampiro que tenga 3 o menos de sangre o con un siervo girado. Este siervo activo obtiene 1 acoso opcional, sólo utilizable para continuar el combate, durante ese combate.

card_text: Ⓓ Enter combat with a vampire who has 3 or fewer blood or with a locked minion. This acting minion gets 1 optional press, only usable to continue combat, during that combat.

text: If the action is not blocked and the target does not meet the requirements anymore, it is successful but has no effect. [LSJ 20070411] [LSJ 20090514]

name: Harass

card_text:
Only usable when this vampire successfully blocks an ally or younger vampire.
[for] Cancel the resulting combat.
[FOR] As above, and destroy a weapon or vehicle on the acting minion.

text: The block needs to be successful, so the blocking minion is locked. [ANK 20190708]

name: Hard Case

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Ⓓ Your prey burns 3 pool for each Choir card you control. Burn all Choir cards you control.
flavor_text:
Their songs are at once captivating and deadly — much like I suspect the Sirens to be themselves.
Jan Pieterzoon, Ventrue
name: Harmony

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a Sabbat vampire.
Put this card on this vampire. The attached vampire gets +1 hunt. A vampire can have only one Harvest Rites.

text: The hunt bonus applies to non-standard hunt actions, blood comes from the target of the hunt. [RTR 20030519] [RTR 20180511]

name: Harvest Rites

card_text:
Requires a ready cardinal or regent. Unique werewolf with 4 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed.
Harzomatuili gets one optional maneuver each combat. Damage from his hand strikes is aggravated. Once during each Ⓓ action, he can burn 1 life to get +1 intercept. If Harzomatuili has fewer than 4 life during your unlock phase, he gains 1 life from the blood bank.
name: Harzomatuili

card_text:
Retainer with 1 life.
[pro][ser] This minion can prevent 1 damage each combat. The opposing minion takes 1 damage each round during strike resolution when the range is close.
[PRO][SER] As above, but the opposing minion takes 2 damage.

text: The damage is neither environmental nor considered done by the minion it is on: it is damage done by the retainer. [ANK 20180612]

Damage is inflicted even against a dodge. A "strike: combat ends" ends combat before damage is applied, as will a combattant going to torpor during first strike. [RTR 19941109] [TOM 19951216] [PIB 20140324] [ANK 20200422]
The discipline level used to recruit it decides which version it is (inferior or superior). This does not change once it is in play. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20180612]
Does not gain additional strikes from its owner. [RTR 19941109]

name: Hatch the Viper

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a non-sterile Gargoyle.
Put this card into play. This card represents a 1-capacity Gargoyle of the same sect with basic Visceratika [vis]. Move 1 blood from the bank to this Gargoyle. This Gargoyle cannot act this turn. Once this game, this Gargoyle can burn 1 blood during your unlock phase to gain flight [FLIGHT].

text: The created vampire is not unique. [LSJ 20100221]

name: Hatchling

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[nec] Put this card on a location you control. The controller of this location can burn this card to cause an action directed at this location to fail. A location can have only one Haunt.
[NEC] Ⓓ Burn a location that doesn't require Giovanni to play.
name: Haunt

card_text:
[dem] Ⓓ Put this card on any minion. The minion with this card burns 1 blood or life during his or her unlock phase. Any minion can burn this card as an action. A minion can have only one The Haunting.
[DEM] As above, but this action is at +1 stealth.
name: The Haunting

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card on a Tzimisce. When this Tzimisce blocks, he or she may play combat cards in the resulting combat as if all of his or her Disciplines were at the superior level.
name: Haven Affinity

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an anarch.
Put this card in play. At the end of a combat involving an anarch you control, if both combatants are still ready, you may burn this card to have the two combatants begin another combat.

text: Effects that end combat and then do something else after combat (include continuing the action as if unblocked) will be lost, except for unlock effects. [LSJ 19980109] [RTR 20020501]
Cannot be used to start a new combat if there is already a pending combat queued. [RTR 20020501]

name: Haven Hunting

fr.name: Refuge exposé
fr.card_text: Mettez cette carte sur un vampire disponible. N'importe quel serviteur peut entrer en combat contre ce vampire en action Ⓓ à +1 en discrétion. Ce vampire peut brûler cette carte en action Ⓓ à +1 en discrétion.
fr.flavor_text:
À travers ma ruine allez donc sans remords.
Charles Baudelaire, "Le Mort joyeux"

es.name: Refugio descubierto
es.card_text: Ponle esta carta a un vampiro preparado. Cualquier siervo puede entrar en combate con este vampiro con una acción Ⓓ con +1 de sigilo. Este vampiro puede quemar esta carta con una acción Ⓓ con +1 de sigilo.
es.flavor_text:
A través de mi ruina id pues sin que os remuerda.
Charles Baudelaire, "El muerto alegre"

card_text: Put this card on a ready vampire. Any minion can enter combat with this vampire as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. This vampire can burn this card as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.
flavor_text:
Come burrow through my ruins, shed not a tear.
Charles Baudelaire, "The Gladly Dead"
name: Haven Uncovered

card_text:
Vehicle.
The minion with this vehicle gets an optional press each combat. A minion may have only 1 vehicle.
name: Hawg

card_text:
Only usable after action resolution (successful or not).
[san] Choose a Blood Brother of the same circle as this Blood Brother. As your next action, the chosen Blood Brother can play the action card used for this action from your ash heap as if from your hand.
[SAN] As above, but this card costs 1 fewer blood.

text: Must be played after combat if the action is blocked [RTR 19980623]

A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. Vampires with the same name (eg. {The Embrace}, non-unique vampires) do not share a circle by default, each has his own circle of one by default. [LSJ 20020609]

name: Hay Ride

card_text:
Play after range is determined. Only usable at close range. Not usable if this minion played a Haymaker last round.
This minion's initial strike this round will be strike: hand strike at +1 damage, and the opposing minion's initial strike this round gets first strike. If either minion inflicts more damage than the other this round, that minion gets an optional press this round.

text: Additional damage inherits all of the properties of the base damage. [TOM 19960225]

name: Haymaker

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[cel] Unlock a younger vampire you control.
[obe] Add up to 2 life to an ally, not to exceed his or her starting amount.
[OBE] Rescue a vampire from torpor, and that vampire gains 1 blood from the blood bank.

text: [OBE] Is not the default action, no blood is paid for the rescue. [ANK 20181017]

name: Healing Touch

card_text:
[ser] Put this card on the acting vampire. This vampire treats aggravated damage as normal damage. Any minion may burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
[SER] As above, and this vampire may prevent 1 damage each combat.
name: Heart of Darkness

fr.name: Cœur de Nizchetus
fr.card_text:
Unique.
Si son possesseur est disponible durant votre phase de redressement, vous pouvez piocher jusqu'à 3 cartes sans défausser et déplacer ensuite le même nombre de cartes de votre main vers le dessous de votre bibliothèque.
fr.flavor_text:
De temps en temps, je pense le voir battre. Ce ne sont peut-être que des ombres dansantes, mais la fortune sourit.
Radu Bistri, Tzimisce

es.name: Corazón de Nizchetus
es.card_text:
Único.
Si el portador está preparado durante tu fase de enderezamiento, puedes robar hasta 3 cartas sin descartarte y luego pasar la misma cantidad de cartas de tu mano al fondo de tu biblioteca.
es.flavor_text:
En ocasiones, creo que lo veo latir. Tan sólo sombras danzantes, quizás, pero a continuación la fortuna me sonríe.
Radu Bistri, Tzimisce

card_text:
Unique.
If the bearer is ready during your unlock phase, you can draw up to 3 cards without discarding and then move the same number of cards from your hand to the bottom of your library.
flavor_text:
Occasionally, I think I see it beat. Just dancing shadows, perhaps, but fortune follows.
Radu Bistri, Tzimisce
name: Heart of Nizchetus

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[pre] Put this card on the acting vampire. This vampire gets +1 bleed. A vampire can have only one Heart of the City.
[PRE] As above, but this vampire gets +2 bleed.
flavor_text:
If you would be so kind as to step into my office, I shall be so kind as to let you delight in my presence.
Sebastian Melmoth, Toreador Prince of San Francisco
name: Heart of the City

card_text:
Only usable during a bleed action.
[aus][chi] +1 bleed (limited). You cannot play another action modifier to increase this bleed. If an ally or younger vampire is currently attempting to block this action, that block fails and that minion cannot block this action.
[AUS][CHI] As above, but with +2 bleed (limited).
name: Heart's Desire

card_text:
Unique location.
Any Assamite can add 1 blood to this card as an action. During your influence phase, you can move any amount of blood from this card to an Assamite in your uncontrolled region.
name: Heartblood of the Clan

card_text:
Only usable by an unlocked vampire not involved in the current combat.
[nec] Prevent 1 damage to an ally in combat.
[obe] Only usable when an ally would be burned in combat. That ally and any cards and counters on them are put out of play instead (breaking any temporary control effects). Move that ally to the ready region with the cards and counters on them during the next discard phase, with 1 life if they have no life.
[OBE] As [obe] above, but with 2 life if they have no life, not to exceed their starting life.

text: [nec] Cannot be used if there is no damage to prevent. [LSJ 20001114]

name: Heaven's Gate

fr.name: Château de Heidelberg, Allemagne
fr.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Vous pouvez l'incliner pour déplacer des points de sang, des équipements et/ou des compagnons entre deux vampires disponibles que vous contrôlez. Non utilisable durant une action.
fr.flavor_text:
La nuit. La pluie. Un ciel blafard que déchiquette
De flèches et de tours à jour la silhouette
D'une ville gothique éteinte au lointain gris.
Paul Verlaine, "Effet de nuit"

es.name: Castillo de Heidelberg, Alemania
es.card_text:
Lugar único.
Gírala para pasar sangre, equipo o criados entre dos vampiros preparados que controles. No se puede usar durante una acción.
es.flavor_text:
La noche. La lluvia. Un cielo incoloro que desgarra
De flechas y de torres a plena luz la silueta
De una ciudad gótica apagada en la gris lejanía.
Paul Verlaine, "Efecto nocturno"

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock to move blood, equipment and/or retainers between any two ready vampires you control. Cannot be used during an action.
flavor_text:
Night. Rain. The lurid sky that lets
The spires and towers show grey silhouettes
Of an old Gothic town by distance dimmed.
Paul Verlaine, "Night Effect"

text: May not be locked "in response" to an effect: all effects are instantaneous except for actions and certain combat effects. [LSJ 20010110] [LSJ 20050111]
Cannot be used to put a card on a vampire who is prohibited to have it (eg. an equipment on {Enkidu, The Noah}). [LSJ 19980831]
Cannot be used before damage is inflicted after action resolution (eg. {Force of will}, {Daring the Dawn}): this is still during the action. [ANK 20171124]
Cannot be used after a diablerie or an {Abactor} resolution and before the Blood Hunt: the Blood Hunt is part of the action although it is independant from it. [LSJ 20090722-2] [LSJ 20030618]
Can be used to move more blood than the target can hold: the excess goes to the blood bank. [ANK 20170804]

name: Heidelberg Castle, Germany

card_text:
Vehicle.
When a minion equips with the Helicopter, lock it. After resolving a successful action, this minion may lock the Helicopter to unlock. A minion may have only one vehicle.
flavor_text:
We'll take a helicopter. There and back in a night.
Hesha Ruhadze, Follower of Set
name: Helicopter

card_text:
Requires an anarch. Only one Hell-for-Leather may be played at a given Discipline each combat.
[ani] Strike: dodge, with an additional strike (limited).
[cel] Additional strike that doesn't count against the limit.
[obt] Play if this anarch is ready and the opposing minion is not. The opposing minion's controller burns 2 pool.
name: Hell-for-Leather

card_text:
Ghoul with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
The Hellhound cannot take actions. If the Hellhound has only 1 life during your unlock phase, it gains 1 life from the blood bank.

text: Is not mortal, is a monster. [ANK 20200203-2] [LSJ 20060515]

name: Hellhound

card_text:
Demon with 5 life. 3 strength, 1 bleed, flight [FLIGHT].
The Herald may enter combat with a ready minion controlled by another Methuselah as a Ⓓ action. The Herald may play cards requiring basic Daimoinon [dai], Potence [pot] and/or Presence [pre] as a vampire with a capacity of 5. If a card would give him blood, give him life instead. If the Herald has less than 5 life during your unlock phase, add 1 life. During your influence phase, burn 1 pool or burn the Herald.

text: Can use {Charming Lobby} to call a referendum "as a vampire". [RTR 20020501]

If it uses its last life to pay for an action, the action still resolves fully. If that leads to an oust, the oust is resolved before resolving effects triggered by the fact that the Herald burns. [LSJ 20080512]
If it uses its last life to play an action modifier, the action fails. If it uses its last life to play a strike, combat ends before strike resolution. [ANK 20180928-1]

name: Herald of Topheth

card_text:
+3 stealth action.
[pot] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +1 strength. This vampire can strike: burn equipment. Burn this card if this vampire is in torpor. A vampire can have only one Heroic Might.
[POT] As above, with an additional +1 strength, and this vampire can strike: 2R damage.
name: Heroic Might

card_text:
Ally with 3 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
Hexaped may give a link counter to any Methuselah as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. Remove Hexaped from the game if that action succeeds. The Tremere antitribu who recruited it gets +1 bleed and +1 stealth when bleeding the Methuselah with that link counter.
name: Hexaped

card_text:
[dai] Strike: 2R damage.
[str] Strike: 1R aggravated damage. [str] is not a Discipline.
[STR] As [str] above, and the damage is unpreventable.
name: Hexe

card_text:
Only usable by a ready unlocked vampire other than the acting minion. Only usable after a combat between the acting minion you control and a blocking minion.
[obf] Lock this vampire. This vampire enters combat with the blocking minion. The first round of this new combat, the blocking minion cannot strike.
[OBF] As above, with an optional press.

text: Effects that end combat and then do something else after combat (include continuing the action as if unblocked) will be lost, except for unlock effects. [LSJ 19980109] [RTR 20020501]
Cannot be used to start a new combat if there is already a pending combat queued. [RTR 20020501]
Can only be played by the controller of the acting minion. [LSJ 19990425]
Cannot be used to enter combat with a vampire on his way to torpor. [LSJ 20100604-1]

name: Hidden Lurker

card_text:
[obf] Put this card in play. Your minions get +1 stealth on non-bleeding Ⓓ actions against your prey. Any minion may burn this card as a Ⓓ action. A Methuselah may have only one Hidden Pathways in play.
[OBF] As above, but playing this card is a +1 stealth action.
name: Hidden Pathways

fr.name: Force cachée
fr.card_text:
[for] Prévenir X+1 points de dégâts.
[FOR] Comme ci-dessus, avec 1 poursuite optionnelle.

es.name: Fuerza oculta
es.card_text:
[for] Prevente de X+1 de daño.
[FOR] Como antes, con 1 acoso opcional.

card_text:
[for] Prevent X+1 damage.
[FOR] As above, with 1 optional press.

text: The 'X' in card text refers to the cost of the card. [LSJ 19970224]
Prevents up to X+1 damage, it can prevent less. [RTR 20041202]
[FOR] The press can only be used during the current round. [TOM 19960521]

name: Hidden Strength

card_text:
Not usable by an imbued with Illuminate.
[ACTION MODIFIER] [1 CONVICTION] Only usable as the action is announced. Monsters get -1 intercept against this action.
[REACTION] [1 CONVICTION] Only usable during a monster's Ⓓ action targeting this imbued. The action fails.
flavor_text:
The surgical strike is better. Do damage. Disappear. Repeat.
Joshua "God45" Matthews, Wayward

text: [REACTION] Can be used only when reactions can be used (unlocked or with a wake effect). It does not count as playing a reaction card. [LSJ 20070403] [LSJ 20070413]
[REACTION] Modifiers and reactions that can be used at the end/after an action can still be used afterwards. [LSJ 20041022]
[ACTION MODIFIER] [1 CONVICTION] Cards and effects that can be played "as the action is announced" (and only them) can be played before it. [ANK 20190425]

name: Hide

card_text:
[aus] Reduce a bleed against you by 1.
[val] The action fails, unless the acting minion burns 1 blood. Only one Hide the Heart can be played at [val] each action.
[VAL] Reduce a bleed against you by 2, or lock to reduce a bleed against any Methuselah by 2.

text: [val] If the action fails, modifiers and reactions that can be used at the end/after an action can still be used afterwards. [LSJ 20041022]
[val] An ally has life, not blood, he cannot pay. [LSJ 20050216] [ANK 20190701]
[val], [VAL] If another Methusalah is the target, he must declare whether he attempts or declines to block before Hide the Heart can be played. [LSJ 20100507] [PIB 20150820]

name: Hide the Heart

card_text:
[obf] [COMBAT] Cancel a combat card that requires Auspex [aus] as it is played. No cost is paid.
[OBF] [ACTION MODIFIER] Cancel a reaction card that requires Auspex as it is played. No cost is paid.
name: Hide the Mind

card_text:
Requires a Laibon.
If this referendum succeeds, put this card on the acting Laibon. This Laibon gets +1 bleed. Cards which require a non-Laibon title cannot be played on this Laibon nor while this Laibon is acting. A minion may have only one Hiding in the Open.
name: Hiding in the Open

card_text: Choose a Follower of Set. If this referendum passes, put this card on the chosen vampire. The vampire with this card has 1 additional vote. Any vampire who successfully blocks the vampire with this card burns 1 blood (before combat, if any).
name: Hierophant

card_text:
Requires a Laibon with three or more Aye.
+1 stealth, +2 stealth if this action is undirected. If the action succeeds, you may discard up to two cards from your hand (draw afterward).
name: High Aye

card_text: Maneuver, only usable to go to long range. If this minion has flight [FLIGHT] and the opposing minion does not, play before range is determined to set the range for the round to long. A minion may play only one High Ground each round.

text: When setting the range for the round, no other effect can be used to reset the range. Skip the determine range step this round, but other pre-range effects can be played afterwards. [RTR 19970630] [ANK 20180720]

name: High Ground

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Gain 4 pool when you put this card into play or gain control of it. Any vampire can steal this location for his or her controller as a Ⓓ action. Burn 4 pool when you lose control of the High Museum (including when it is burned or becomes contested).
name: High Museum of Art, Atlanta

card_text:
Requires a Laibon with three or more Orun.
For the remainder of this action, cards that require any Disciplines cost this Laibon 1 less blood, and your hand size is one card larger.
flavor_text:
As nightfall does not come at once, neither does oppression... it is in such twilight that we all must be aware of change in the air -- however slight -- lest we become victims of the darkness.
William O. Douglas
name: High Orun

card_text: Only usable if playing for ante. Successful referendum means each Methuselah decides whether to ante the next card in his or her library or be ousted from the game. Decisions should be made simultaneously, as follows: each Methuselah holds out a hand with zero or one blood in it. Open hands simultaneously. A pool in a Methuselah's hand indicates that he or she chooses not to be ousted.
name: High Stakes

card_text:
Unique werewolf with 3 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
High Top gets +1 intercept. High Top may enter combat with any minion controlled by another Methuselah as a Ⓓ action. High Top gets an additional strike (limited) each round and an optional maneuver once each combat. He may play cards requiring basic Celerity [cel] as a vampire with a capacity of 4. If High Top has less than 3 life during your unlock phase, he gains 1 life.

text: If it uses its last life to play an action modifier, the action fails. If it uses its last life to play a strike, combat ends before strike resolution. [ANK 20180928-1]

name: High Top

card_text:
Vehicle. Haven.
This minion gets an optional press to end combat on the first round of combat. If the bearer is an anarch, any vampire attempting a Ⓓ action targeting this anarch doesn't unlock as normal on his or her next unlock phase (even if the action isn't successful). Any werewolf may burn this equipment and enter combat with this minion as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. A minion may have only one haven and only one vehicle.
flavor_text:
The greatest haven is motion.
Stephen Lenoir, Lasombra antitribu
name: Highway Haven: RV

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[san] Unlock this Blood Brother and another ready Blood Brother of the same circle. Only one Hive Mind can be played at [san] each turn.
[SAN] Add 3 blood to a Blood Brother of the same circle in your uncontrolled region.

text: A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. Vampires with the same name (eg. {The Embrace}, non-unique vampires) do not share a circle by default, each has his own circle of one by default. [LSJ 20020609]

name: Hive Mind

fr.name: Homoncule
fr.card_text:
Compagnon avec 1 point de vie.
[pro] Durant la phase de redressement de n'importe quel Mathusalem, ce vampire peut brûler 1 point de sang pour se redresser.
[PRO] Comme ci-dessus, mais ce compagnon a 2 points de vie.
fr.flavor_text:
Un tas d'os dans un sac de peau, un ballon dégonflé ; un paquet ignoble.
Ronald Chetwynd-Hayes, "En quête de quelque chose à sucer"

es.name: Homúnculo
es.card_text:
Criado con 1 de vida.
[pro] Durante la fase de enderezamiento de cualquier Matusalén, este vampiro puede quemar 1 de sangre para enderezarse.
[PRO] Como antes, pero el /Homúnculo/ tiene 2 de vida.
es.flavor_text:
Un montón de huesos en un saco de piel, un globo desinflado; un bulto horrible.
R. Chetwynd-Hayes, "Buscando algo que chupar"

card_text:
Retainer with 1 life.
[pro] During any Methuselah's unlock phase, this vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock.
[PRO] As above, but Homunculus has 2 life.
flavor_text:
A pile of bones in a skin bag, a deflated balloon; a hideous bundle.
R. Chetwynd-Hayes, "Looking For Something To Suck"

text: The discipline level used to recruit it decides which version it is (inferior or superior). This does not change once it is in play. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20180612]

name: Homunculus

card_text: Successful referendum means each ready vampire with capacity of 8 or more gains 1 blood from the blood bank, and each vampire with capacity of 8 or more in any uncontrolled region gains 1 blood from the blood bank.
name: Honor the Elders

fr.name: Forme monstrueuse
fr.card_text:
Seulement utilisable avant l'étape de manœuvre.
[vic] Ce vampire reçoit +1 en force ce combat.
[VIC] Comme ci-dessus et ce vampire peut prévenir 1 point de dégâts durant chaque round.
fr.flavor_text:
D'où viens-tu, et qui es-tu, forme exécrable...
John Milton, "Le Paradis perdu"

es.name: Forma horrenda
es.card_text:
Sólo utilizable antes de determinar la distancia.
[vic] Este vampiro obtiene +1 de fuerza en este combate.
[VIC] Como antes, y este vampiro puede prevenirse de 1 de daño por asalto.
es.flavor_text:
¿De dónde sales y quién eres, forma execrable?
John Milton, "El paraíso perdido"

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined.
[vic] This vampire gets +1 strength this combat.
[VIC] As above, and this vampire can prevent 1 damage each round.
flavor_text:
Whence and what art thou, execrable shape?
John Milton, "Paradise Lost"
name: Horrid Form

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined in combat.
[chi] Equip this minion with the first weapon you find in your library (working down from the top). This weapon does not contest any card in play. Do not pay the cost for this weapon. Shuffle afterward. At the end of the combat, burn the weapon if it is still in play.
[CHI] As above, but return the equipment to your library at the end of combat if it is still in play. Shuffle afterward.

Burn a scarce vampire in torpor or move a ready scarce vampire to his or her controller's uncontrolled region, with all cards and counters on him or her (which are out of play as long as the vampire remains out of play).

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Lock to give a press, only usable to continue combat, to a minion you control. Any minion may burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
flavor_text:
Collective crimes incriminate no one.

card_text:
Only usable during a referendum.
Each vampire with a capacity above 4 can burn blood to gain votes. A vampire gains 1 vote for each blood he or she burns. A vampire with a capacity above 7 gains an additional vote for each blood he or she burns.

text: Each Methuselah must decide how much blood to burn for it during the resolution. It does not give an ability for the rest of the political action. However, there can be some give and take during the resolution. For example, Methuselahs can choose to burn one blood at a time and wait to see what the others do. [LSJ 20030602]
Cannot be used during a referendum that is automatically passing. [PIB 20150105] [LSJ 19980107]

card_text:
Unique mortal with 1 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. Requires a ready imbued.
Moise may strike for 2R damage. He may take a +1 stealth action to search your library (shuffle afterward) or hand for an equipment and move it to any ready imbued you control (that imbued must meet the requirements and pay the cost as normal).
name: Moise Kasavubu

card_text:
Unique equipment.
Search your library and/or ash heap for up to four cards that require Serpentis [ser] and place them on this card (face down). Shuffle afterward. You may look at the cards at any time. This Follower of Set may play a card from this equipment as if from your hand (requirements and cost apply as usual). When the last card is removed, burn this equipment.

text: Once in play, can be equipped from the minion it's on (rulebook action) by another minion that does not meet the requirements. [ANK 20180719-3]
If it leaves play, the card on it is burned. [LSJ 20021128]

Requires a ready anarch. Only usable when a non-anarch minion is acting.

[cel] +1 intercept. Not usable if the acting minion has Celerity [cel].
[dom] Only usable when you are being bled by a younger vampire. Lock this vampire to cause the action to fail.

text: [ani] Can be used by a vampire who is already attempting to block. [ANK 20181122-2]

card_text:
[ani] Only usable if an ally or younger vampire attempts to block. Allies and younger vampires get -1 intercept.
[spi] +1 stealth.

text: [SPI] The burn blood effect is not reduced by effects that reduce the cost of the card (eg. {The Path of Harmony}). The card cannot be played if the minion cannot afford to burn the blood. [ANK 20210226]

La chair est cendre, l'âme est flamme.

Este mundo siempre fue, es y será fuego eternamente vivo.

flavor_text:
I got a dog eat dog sly smile
I got a Molotov cocktail with a match to go
I smoke my cigarette with style
Guns N' Roses, "Nightrain"

text: If the opponent strikes: combat ends, this strike is not resolved and the Cocktail is not put on this minion, even if combat continues thanks to another effect like {Relentless Reaper}. [ANK 20200203-1]

name: Molotov Cocktail

card_text:
Requires a vampire with capacity 7 or more. Only usable after resolution of an action blocked by an ally or a vampire with capacity 5 or less. Not usable if, during this action, more than 1 round of combat has occurred or this vampire has lost 3 or more blood or ended combat before the press step.
The action continues as if unblocked.

text: If the action continues "as if unblocked", all action modifiers and reaction cards are still in effect, even those pertaining to a successful block. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20190116]
If the action continues "as if unblocked", Methusalah that had declined to block before do not get another opportunity to block. [ANK 20190116]
An action cannot continue "as if unblocked" after a combat resulting from a successful action. [RTR 19970630]

"continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the action card is not in the ash heap, then the action cannot be continued. [LSJ 20070808-1]
Can be used if a Slave locked to enter combat instead of the blocking minion, if the other conditions are met. [ANK 20200114]
Is played after resolution, but still during the action. Cards and effects that played "after resolution" (eg. {Freak Drive}) can be played before it, but not after. [LSJ 19981028] [LSJ 20100206-2]
Is played after all combats are handled. Can be played from torpor. [LSJ 20030103] [ANK 20181219] [ANK 20180906]

name: Momentary Delay

card_text:
Unique master. Only usable if you have one or more victory points.
Put this card in play. You may lock this card during your unlock phase to gain 1 pool.
flavor_text: It might have made Rufus feel better to know that he was far from the first Kindred to vanish off the streets of a Camarilla city in recent nights, and that he would be even farther from the last.

[cel] Strike: combat ends.

text: [val] If the combat continues or a new combat begins, the card is not put on the opposing minion, he can act and block. [RTR 20020501]
[VAL] If the action continues "as if unblocked", all action modifiers and reaction cards are still in effect, even those pertaining to a successful block. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20190116]

[VAL] "continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the action card is not in the ash heap, then the action cannot be continued. [LSJ 20070808-1]
[VAL] If the combat continues or a new combat begins, the \"action continues as if unblocked\" effect is lost. [LSJ 19980109] [RTR 20020501]

card_text:

If the action continues "as if unblocked", Methusalah that had declined to block before do not get another opportunity to block. [ANK 20190116]

"continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the action card is not in the ash heap, then the action cannot be continued. [LSJ 20070808-1]

text: Cards and effects that can be played "as the action is announced" can be played before it. [ANK 20190425]

Replace the action card (if any) before playing it. [ANK 20181208]

card_text:
Master: unique location. Haven.
Put this card on a minion you control. This minion cannot be the target of other Methuselahs' actions. Any Methuselah burns an additional pool when playing master cards on (or that target) this minion. Burn this card if this minion enters torpor. A minion may have only one haven.

text: All Methuselahs, including the target vampire's controller, must pay one extra pool when playing Master cards on the target minion. [TOM 19951208-1]
Adds one to the cost of the master card targetting the vampire, cost reductions from other effects do apply. [LSJ 20070829-1]

Choosing is targeting: cards that "choose" the vampire like {The Rack}, {Toreador Grand Ball}, {Piper} or {Tend the Flock} are considered to target it, their cost is increased. Actions that choose the vampire cannot be played against him (eg. {Propaganda}, {Spirit Marionette}, {Shattering Crescendo}) [LSJ 20031010] [LSJ 20090319] [ANK 20180907]

Actions that target retainers, equipment, or other cards on the minion are allowed, as are actions that target cards not on the minion, even if such cards have "named" or "chosen" that minion. [TOM 19951208-1] [LSJ 19980302-1]
If contested, it will not be burned when the target (vampire) goes to torpor, nor will it be burned if it enters play while the target vampire is in torpor. [RTR 19960124]

text: [mel] [MEL] If the action continues "as if unblocked", all action modifiers and reaction cards are still in effect, even those pertaining to a successful block. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20190116]

[mel] [MEL] "continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the action card is not in the ash heap, then the action cannot be continued. [LSJ 20070808-1]

[OBF] Como antes, y este vampiro puede quemar X de sangre para dar a las siguientes X acciones que tus siervos realicen este turno +1 de sigilo. Sólo se puede jugar un ejemplar de esta carta a superior por turno.

card_text:
Only usable by a ready unlocked vampire other than the acting minion. Only one Veil the Legions can be played each action.
[obf] The acting minion gets +1 stealth.
[OBF] As above, and this vampire can burn X blood to give the next X actions your minions perform this turn +1 stealth. Only one Veil the Legions can be played at superior each turn.

text: Can only be played by the controller of the acting minion. [LSJ 19990425]

name: Veil the Legions

card_text:
Only usable by a blocking minion.
[chi] The acting minion's stealth is set to 0. (He or she gets -X stealth, where X is his or her current stealth.)
[CHI] As above, and once during the resulting combat if this vampire successfully blocks, he or she may steal 1 blood as a strike.

text: [CHI] The strike can be used on a minion with no blood. [RTR 20010711]
[CHI] The strike is not ranged. [TOM 19951215-2]

name: Veiled Sight

card_text:
Blood hunt referendum.
Choose an ally or younger non-titled vampire controlled by your prey. Successful referendum means that minion is burned. If this referendum fails or is canceled, no more Veles' Hunts can be played this game.

text: Modifiers and reactions can be played during and after the referendum (eg. {Voter Captivation}, {Delaying Tactics}). [LSJ 20081202-2]

name: Veles' Hunt

card_text:
[ser] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. Put 1 corruption counter on a minion casting votes or ballots in this referendum.
[SER] Only usable during the polling step of a political action before votes and ballots are cast. Minions with any corruption counters cannot cast votes or ballots during this referendum.

text: If an effect causes a minion to be unable to cast votes or ballots during a referendum, that minion is forced to abstain, whether he or she had already cast votes or ballots or not. [PIB 20141226]

name: Velvet Tongue

card_text:
Only usable when you are successfully bled for more than 2 pool.
Put this card on the acting minion. Brujah antitribu get +1 strength in combat with the minion with this card. Any ready Brujah antitribu may enter combat with this vampire as a Ⓓ action. Burn this card if this minion goes to torpor.
flavor_text:
I will feed fat the ancient grudge I bear him.
William Shakespeare, "The Merchant of Venice", act I, scene 3
name: Vendetta

card_text:
Unique equipment.
The vampire with this equipment has superior Thaumaturgy [THA]. Any Tremere or Tremere antitribu may enter combat with the minion with this equipment as a Ⓓ action.
name: Veneficorum Artum Sanguis

card_text:
Unique mage with 2 life. 1 strength, 2 bleed. Requires an infernal vampire.
Veneficti has +1 stealth. He can steal a demon ally or burn a demon retainer as a Ⓓ action. He cannot be the target of a Ⓓ action by an ally or a vampire with capacity 6 or less.

text: The burn option can be used if all your infernal vampires are in torpor. [LSJ 20091203]

name: Veneficti

card_text:
Only usable when this acting minion is blocked, before combat begins.
[ser] Place a corruption counter on the blocking minion. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds the blood capacity of that vampire or the cost of that ally, you may burn all of your corruption counters on that minion to gain control of him or her (combat is canceled). Otherwise, combat occurs as normal.
[SER] As above, but the cost of this card is reduced by 1 blood.

text: Modifiers that are played before block resolution like {Change of Target} can be played after Venenation. [ANK 20190524] [LSJ 20020126]

If the combat is canceled by Venenation, the action is still blocked, {Mask of a Thousand Faces} cannot be used to continue it, but an effect can be used to continue the action as if unblocked (eg. {Crypt's Sons}, {Momentary Delay}). [ANK 20181003] [LSJ 20010803-2]

name: Venenation

card_text: +2 intercept, only usable when a Camarilla vampire is taking an action.
flavor_text:
For surely it is better to rule in the darkness than to humble myself falsely in the light.
Caine, from The Erciyes Fragments
name: Venetian Conference

card_text:
[pot] Strike: hand strike or use a melee weapon strike. This strike is at +1 damage.
[val] As [pot] above, and this strike cannot be dodged.
[VAL] As [val] above, but this strike is at +2 damage.
flavor_text:
Tonight, there would be a small measure of vengeance, one grain of sand to add to a desert that would in time stretch across the face of the Earth.
Parmenides, Assamite

text: Additional damage inherits all of the properties of the base damage. [TOM 19960225]

name: Vengeance of Samiel

card_text:
Wraith with 2 life.
The employer gets +1 bleed. Vengeful Spirit inflicts 1 damage on the opposing minion each round of combat during normal strike resolution at close range.

text: The damage is neither environmental nor considered done by the minion it is on: it is damage done by the retainer. [ANK 20180612]

Damage is inflicted even against a dodge. A "strike: combat ends" ends combat before damage is applied, as will a combattant going to torpor during first strike. [RTR 19941109] [TOM 19951216] [PIB 20140324] [ANK 20200422]
Does not gain additional strikes from its owner. [RTR 19941109]

name: Vengeful Spirit

card_text:
Master.
Put this card in play. Each ready Ventrue gets an additional vote during political actions. This card may be burned by any minion as a Ⓓ action; Brujah get +1 stealth when attempting that action.
name: Ventrue Directorate Assembly

fr.name: Quartier général Ventrue
fr.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Vous pouvez l'incliner durant l'étape de vote de n'importe quel référendum pour recevoir +3 voix.
fr.flavor_text: Le clan Ventrue est assez proche d'une multinationale. Chaque ville importante a son point de rendez-vous où les Ventrues peuvent chercher des allégeances et obtenir des informations.

es.name: Cuartel general Ventrue
es.card_text:
Lugar único.
Gírala durante la fase de votación de cualquier referéndum para conseguir +3 votos.
es.flavor_text: El clan Ventrue está organizado como si se tratara de una corporación multinacional. Cada ciudad importante tiene un lugar de reunión donde los Ventrue pueden buscar lealtades y obtener información.

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock during the polling step of any referendum to get +3 votes.
flavor_text: The Ventrue clan is organized much like a multinational corporation. Each major city has a meeting place where Ventrue may seek allegiance and obtain information.
name: Ventrue Headquarters

card_text:
Master. Investment.
Put this card in play with 1 blood on it for each Ventrue antitribu you control. You may use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Burn this card if it has no blood.
name: Ventrue Investment

card_text:
Title.
Choose a ready Ventrue. If this referendum is successful, put this card on the chosen Ventrue to represent the unique Camarilla title of Ventrue Justicar. In this referendum, each Ventrue gets 1 extra vote.
name: Ventrue Justicar

card_text:
+3 stealth action.
Ⓓ Bleed.
flavor_text:
They fought the dogs and killed the cats,
And bit the babies in the cradles,
And ate the cheeses out of the vats,
And licked the soup from the cooks' own ladles.
Robert Browning, "The Pied Piper of Hamelin"
name: Vermin Channel

fr.name: Calice
fr.card_text:
Triviale.
Mettez cette carte sur n'importe quel vampire et vous pouvez brûler une carte nommée /Poupée de sang/. Durant sa phase de redressement, le contrôleur de ce vampire peut déplacer 1 point de sang de ce vampire vers sa réserve ou de sa réserve vers ce vampire.

es.name: Recipiente
es.card_text:
Nimiedad.
Ponle esta carta a cualquier vampiro, y puedes quemar una /Muñeca de sangre/ (si la hay). Durante su fase de enderezamiento, el controlador de este vampiro puede pasar 1 de sangre de este vampiro a su reserva sanguínea o de su reserva sanguínea a este vampiro.

card_text:
Trifle.
Put this card on any vampire, and you can burn a card named /Blood Doll/ (if any). During their unlock phase, this vampire's controller can move 1 blood from this vampire to their pool or from their pool to this vampire.

text: Can be used when the vampire is in torpor. [PIB 20150522]

name: Vessel

card_text:
Equipment.
The vampire with this equipment may burn this card to gain 1 level of any one Discipline until your next unlock phase. The vampire cannot choose a Discipline he or she already has at the superior level.
name: Vial of Elder Vitae

card_text:
Equipment.
The vampire with this Vial may burn it before range is chosen in a round of combat to get +1 strength and an additional strike (limited) each round for the remainder of combat. If he or she does so, he or she cannot use other equipment cards for the remainder of combat.
name: Vial of Garou Blood

card_text:
Master: Discipline.
Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gains 1 level of Vicissitude [vic]. Capacity increases by 1: the vampire is one generation older. Cannot be placed on a vampire with superior Vicissitude [VIC].
name: Vicissitude

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a Tzimisce. Put a poison counter on this card each time this vampire plays a card that requires Vicissitude [vic]. If the number of poison counters on this card is greater than the capacity of the vampire, burn him or her at the end of the current action or combat.
name: Vicissitude Poisoning

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card in play and choose a card in your prey's ash heap by name. During any Methuselah's unlock phase, you may lock this card to remove three copies of the chosen card in your prey's ash heap from the game to cause your prey to burn 1 pool.

card_text:
Master: unique hunter-list.
Put this card in play. Lock this card to give a Defender +1 intercept when a monster is acting.
flavor_text:
We've probably all learned the ropes of the hunt here, but a few reminders are in order.
Jack "Hannibal137" Harmon, Defender
name: Vigil: The Thin Line

card_text:
[ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable at the end of a successful action (after resolving the action). Unlock this imbued.
[REACTION] [1 CONVICTION] Only usable by a locked imbued. Unlock this imbued.
flavor_text:
The clearest eye is still blind when shut.
François "Warden" Loehr, Judge

text: [REACTION] [1 CONVICTION] Can be used only when reactions can be used (unlocked or with a wake effect). It does not count as playing a reaction card. [LSJ 20070403] [LSJ 20070413]
[ACTION MODIFIER] Cards and effects that can be played "after resolution" (and only them) can be played after its use. [ANK 20190425]

name: Vigilance

fr.name: Serf
fr.card_text:
Triviale.
Mettez cette carte sur un vampire que vous contrôlez quel que soit son nombre de points de sang et déplacez de 2 à 5 points de sang de ce vampire vers votre réserve. Les cartes nommées /Drainer le serviteur/ vous coûtent 1 point de réserve de plus à jouer. Serf coûte 1 point de réserve de plus à jouer sur ce vampire.

es.name: Villano
es.card_text:
Nimiedad.
Ponle esta carta a un vampiro que controles que tenga cualquier cantidad de sangre y pasa de 2 a 5 de sangre de ese vampiro a tu reserva sanguínea. /Drenar al siervo/ te cuesta 1 más de reserva sanguínea. Jugarle un /Villano/ a este vampiro cuesta 1 más de reserva sanguínea.

card_text:
Trifle.

text: Pay the cost (if any) at the same time you gain pool from it, you do not get ousted in between. [LSJ 20020620]
If the target has less blood at resolution than the amount annouced, you take what you can. [LSJ 20100216] [ANK 20180512-2]

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Burn a contract on a minion you control.
flavor_text:
Your worst enemies are those whose faces are cheerful while their hearts are bitter.
Caecilius Statius, "Hypobolimæus"

card_text:
Master: unique location.

card_text:
[pre] +1 stealth.
[mel] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 stealth and +2 bleed (limited), or +2 bleed (limited).

text: [MEL] Cards and effects that can be played "as the action is announced" (and only them) can be played before it. [ANK 20190425]

+1 stealth action.

Unique.

es.name: Visita del Capuchino

Única.
Pon esta carta en juego con 4 fichas. Obtienes +1 a la mano por cada ficha de esta carta. Cada vez que vayas a reemplazar una carta que no sea ésta, en vez de eso quema 1 ficha de esta carta. Quema esta carta cuando ya no tenga fichas.

card_text:
Unique.
Put this card in play with 4 counters. You get +1 hand size for each counter on this card. Each time you would replace a card other than this card, instead burn 1 counter from this card. Burn this card if it has no counters.

card_text:
Unique ghoul with 2 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed. Requires an anarch.

A vampire you control can give control of Vivienne to another Methuselah as a Ⓓ action. A vampire controlled by another Methuselah can steal Vivienne as a Ⓓ action.

If it uses its last life to play an action modifier, the action fails. If it uses its last life to play a strike, combat ends before strike resolution. [ANK 20180928-1]

Only usable when this vampire successfully blocks an ally or younger vampire.
[dem] Lock this reacting vampire. Combat does not occur.

It is everything singing in my head at once.
Anatole, The Prophet of Gehenna, Malkavian

card_text:
[tha] Burn 1 blood to get +1 intercept.
[vis] +1 intercept, or give +1 intercept to a vampire to whom this vampire is enslaved.

text: [tha] The burn blood effect is not reduced by effects that reduce the cost of the card (eg. {Uta Kovacs}). The card cannot be played if the minion cannot afford to burn the blood. [ANK 20210226]

fr.name: Envoûtement des électeurs

Seulement utilisable après résolution d'une action politique dont le référendum est passé.
[pre] Ce vampire gagne 1 point de sang pour chaque voix de différence.
[PRE] Comme ci-dessus, mais déplacez jusqu'à 2 de ces points de sang vers votre réserve au lieu de vers ce vampire.

Sólo utilizable tras la resolución de una acción política cuyo referéndum haya prosperado.
[pre] Este vampiro gana 1 de sangre por cada voto de diferencia por el cual el referéndum haya prosperado.
[PRE] Como antes, pero pasa hasta 2 de esa sangre a tu reserva sanguínea en vez de a este vampiro.

card_text:
Only usable after resolution of a political action whose referendum passed.
[pre] This vampire gains 1 blood for each vote by which the referendum passed.

text: Is played after the referendum is resolved. If the effect of the referendum ousts the acting Methuselah, there is no time to play it to prevent the ousting. [RTR 19951110]
Can be played before or after other cards that are played "after action resolution" or "if the action was successful". [LSJ 20070327]
Can be used after a referendum that is automatically passing, but X is zero in this case. [PIB 20150105] [LSJ 19980107]
Is played after resolution, but still during the action. Action modifiers and effects that can be played "after resolution" can be played after it. [LSJ 19981028] [ANK 20190425]

name: Voter Captivation

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Only usable during the referendum of a political action. Not usable on a referendum that is automatically passing. The referendum fails. Each Methuselah may play only one Vox Domini each game.
flavor_text:
Are you going to force me to stop? We both know that you can. If you are my master, or speak on his behalf, you can make me do anything you want.
Lucita, Lasombra

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Each Methuselah gets an additional vote during each referendum. Alternatively, during a referendum, you may play this card from your hand to your ash heap as an out-of-turn master to gain 3 votes in that referendum.

text: May still be "canceled as it is played" when used as an out-of-turn master. [LSJ 20031201]

name: Vox Senis

card_text:
Master.
Burn a vampire in torpor.
flavor_text:
Quentin fell into torpor after the encounter with Meshenka and has not been heard from since. A stronger power may have pulled him to Final Death.
Tzimisce, Dublin 2002 Storyline
