card_text:
+1 stealth action. If this hunt is successful, unlock this vampire.
[obf] Remove a minion or retainer in any Methuselah's ash heap from the game to hunt.
[spi] As [obf] above, but at +1 hunt.

text: Is a hunt action. [ANK 20200421]

Is undirected. [ANK 20180202]

card_text:
Transient.
Put this card in play with 10 counters. Whenever a non-Anarch vampire takes an action, burn a counter from this card. Burn this card when it has no counters. During your unlock phase, each anarch burns 1 blood or becomes Camarilla, and each ally burns 1 life.

fr.card_text:
Seulement utilisable par un vampire incliné. À ne pas remplacer jusqu'à votre phase de redressement.

es.card_text:
Sólo utilizable por un vampiro girado. No la reemplaces hasta tu fase de enderezamiento.

card_text:
Only usable by a locked vampire. Do not replace until your unlock phase.

text: The vampire need not attempt to block nor play further reaction cards: that is merely an option. [TOM 19951129]
Can be played after action resolution to use a reaction card (eg. {Fast Reaction} after combat). [LSJ 20091123]
Is replaced before unlocking cards: other unlock effects cannot be ordered before. [ANK 20200129] [LSJ 20091208] [RTR 19951017]

name: Wake with Evening's Freshness

card_text:
Choose X ready Blood Brothers you control who belong to the same circle as this acting vampire (including this acting vampire). Each chosen vampire must burn a blood, or this card has no effect.
[san] Only usable as a bleed action is announced. Choose X ready Blood Brothers you control of the same circle as this Blood Brother, including this Blood Brother. Each chosen Blood Brother burns 1 blood to give this Blood Brother +X bleed (limited).
[SAN] As [san] above, but usable any time before the action is resolved.

text: A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. Vampires with the same name (eg. {The Embrace}, non-unique vampires) do not share a circle by default, each has his own circle of one by default. [LSJ 20020609]
Cards and effects that can be played "as the action is announced" can be played before it. [ANK 20190425]
Cards and effects that are played "as the card is played" must be played before it. Wake effects can be played before it. [ANK 20181208]
Replace the action card (if any) before playing it. [ANK 20181208]

name: Walk of Caine

fr.name: Marcher dans les flammes
fr.card_text:
Non utilisable durant le premier round de combat.
[tha] Frapper à toute portée : 1 point de dégâts aggravés.
[THA] Frapper à toute portée : 2 points de dégâts aggravés.
fr.flavor_text:
Maintenant que vous voilà flammes, je vous dirai comment il faut brûler,
Et purger l'éther de vos ennemis.
John Keats, "Hypérion"

No utilizable durante el primer asalto del combate.
[tha] Ataque: 1 de daño agravado a distancia.
[THA] Ataque: 2 de daño agravado a distancia.

Ahora que sois llamas, os diré cómo quemar
Y purgar el éter de nuestros enemigos.
John Keats, "Hiperión"

card_text:
Not usable during the first round of combat.
[tha] Strike: 1R aggravated damage.
[THA] Strike: 2R aggravated damage.
flavor_text:
Now ye are flames, I'll tell you how to burn
And purge the ether of our enemies.
John Keats, "Hyperion"

card_text: Flip a coin. If it comes up heads, this action is unblockable. If it comes up tails, the Malkavian antitribu takes one damage. This damage is not preventable.
flavor_text:
Those golden times
And those Arcadian scenes that Maro sings...
William Cowper, "The Winter Evening"

card_text:
Unique werewolf with 4 life. 0 bleed, 3 strength.
Master cards cost you an additional pool. Walks-With-Might gets +1 intercept against Followers of Set. Each strike or damaging effect made against him inflicts 1 less damage on him.

text: Only affects the cost of masters played by his controller. [LSJ 20081124-1]

name: Walks-With-Might

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock during an undirected action to give a minion you control +1 intercept for the current action. Lock to select a minion you control. Once this turn, the chosen minion may move a counter from an investment card controlled by any Methuselah to your pool as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.

card_text:
[ACTION MODIFIER][REACTION] Only usable during a referendum. Usable by a locked vampire. This Akunanse gets an additional vote in this referendum.
[ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable when this Akunanse successfully hunts. He or she gains 1 additional blood.
flavor_text:
By coming and going will a bird weave its nest.
Ashanti proverb

text: [ACTION MODIFIER] A hunt is not successful if no blood is gained, even if the hunt action is still successful. [LSJ 20050720-2]
[ACTION MODIFIER] The hunt bonus applies to non-standard hunt actions, blood comes from the target of the hunt. [RTR 20030519] [RTR 20180511]
[ACTION MODIFIER][REACTION] Cannot be used during a referendum that is automatically passing. [PIB 20150105] [LSJ 19980107]

name: Wanderer's Counsel

card_text:
Ghoul with 5 life. 4 strength, 0 bleed.
When War Ghoul enters play, burn an ally or retainer you control. She can enter combat with any ready vampire controlled by another Methuselah as a Ⓓ action. She may prevent 1 damage each round. Lock and burn War Ghoul to burn any location; you cannot use this ability during combat.

text: If you have no other allies and no retainers in play when it is recruited, then you burn it. [RTR 19961113]
An ally or retainer must be burn when it comes into play, regardless of how it did come into play (eg. {Pressing Flesh}). [ANK 20170309-2]

Can use its ability to "lock and burn to burn a location" during an action that would steal it (eg. [PRE] {Entrancement}). The action will have no effect but is still successful if unblocked and must then be paid. [PIB 20121031]
Can use its ability to "lock and burn to burn a location" the turn it is recruited. [ANK 20180517]

name: War Ghoul

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent.
Ⓓ Put this card on a vampire who is not an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Any vampire may enter combat with that vampire as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.

[pre] +1 stealth action. Unlock a younger non-infernal vampire.
[val] +1 stealth action. Rescue a non-infernal vampire from torpor.
[VAL] Ⓓ Diablerize a vampire in torpor. Vampires cannot cast votes or ballots in favor of the blood hunt unless they are Baali, Tremere or Tremere antitribu.

text: [val] Is not the default action, no blood is paid for the rescue. [ANK 20181017]

name: Warding the Beast

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Play on a minion targeted by a Ⓓ action to give that minion +1 intercept. Alternatively, play on a minion in combat. That minion gets an optional strike: dodge this round.
flavor_text:
The storm is coming, he tells me.
Calebros, Nosferatu

fr.card_text:
Seulement utilisable durant une action dirigée contre vous (ou une carte que vous contrôlez).
+2 en interception, avec +1 en interception supplémentaire si ce Nosferatu est titré.

es.name: Entramado de túneles

Sólo utilizable durante una acción directa contra ti (o una carta que controles).
+2 de intercepción, con +1 de intercepción adicional si este Nosferatu tiene título.

card_text:
Only usable during an action directed at you (or a card you control).
+2 intercept, with an additional +1 intercept if this Nosferatu is titled.

fr.name: Gare de Varsovie
fr.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Vous pouvez incliner cette carte lorsqu'un Nosferatu annonce une action non dirigée ; après résolution de l'action, si cette action a été réussie, redressez le Nosferatu qui agit. Vous pouvez brûler cette carte (même si elle est inclinée) pour déplacer un Nosferatu en torpeur vers la région disponible.

es.name: Estación Varsovia
es.card_text:
Lugar único.
Puedes girar esta carta cuando un Nosferatu anuncie una acción indirecta. Tras resolverse la acción, si ésta ha tenido éxito, endereza al Nosferatu activo. Puedes quemar esta carta (aunque esté girada) para pasar a un Nosferatu en letargo a tu zona preparada.

card_text:
Unique location.
You can lock this card as a Nosferatu announces an undirected action; after action resolution, if that action was successful, unlock the acting Nosferatu. You can burn this card (even if it is locked) to move a Nosferatu in torpor to the ready region.

text: Can be burned after the annoucement of a diablerie action to bring the target Nosferatu out of torpor. The action will still be successful if unblocked, but will have no effect: no diablerie happen. [ANK 20181107]

Can be burned during an action to bring back a vampire that was put into torpor during that action, but the action would end with no effect if an effect tries to continue it (eg. {Ambulance}). [LSJ 20090325-2]

The unlock effect is applied after the action is resolved and the referendum (if any) concluded. If the acting vampire is not a Nosferatu anymore at that point, he does not unlock. [LSJ 20090216] [ANK 20180922]

name: Warsaw Station

card_text:
Master: unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, you may move 1 blood from the blood bank to a ready vampire you control. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground card each turn.
name: Warzone Hunting Ground

fr.name: Rejet
fr.card_text:
Hors-tour. Triviale. À ne pas remplacer jusqu'à votre phase de redressement.
Annulez une carte de maître lorsqu'elle est jouée par votre prédateur ou votre proie et son coût n'est pas à payer. Ce Mathusalem reçoit +1 action de phase de maître immédiatement, ou au début de sa prochaine phase de maître si la carte annulée est une carte de maître hors-tour.

es.name: Eliminar
es.card_text:
Fuera de turno. Nimiedad. No la reemplaces hasta tu fase de enderezamiento.
Cancela una carta heril jugada por tu depredador o presa al ser jugada, y su coste no se paga. Ese Matusalén obtiene +1 acción de fase heril inmediatamente, o al principio de su siguiente fase heril si la carta cancelada es una heril fuera de turno.

card_text:
Out-of-turn. Trifle. Do not replace until your unlock phase.
Cancel a master card played by your predator or prey as it is played, and its cost is not paid. That Methuselah gets +1 master phase action immediately, or at the start of their next master phase if the canceled card is an out-of-turn master.

text: If used to cancel a Trifle, the target does not get an extra Master Phase Action from the canceled Trifle. [ANK 20170124] [LSJ 20090126] [RBK 20181001-162]

The additional Master Phase Action it provides does not count as a Trifle bonus, the target can get yet an additional Master Phase Action if they play a Trifle afterwards. [ANK 20170124] [LSJ 20090126]

If used to cancel an out-of-turn master, that Methuselah still cannot play another out-of-turn master against the same master phase, even though the first was canceled and won't count against that master phase. [LSJ 20070309-2]
If the canceled card had a "Do Not Replace Until" clause on it, that clause is canceled as well and the card is replaced normally. [LSJ 20011023]
Is replaced before unlocking cards: other unlock effects cannot be ordered before. [ANK 20200129] [LSJ 20091208] [RTR 19951017]

name: Wash

fr.name: Wasserschloss Anif, Autriche
fr.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Durant votre phase de maître, un Tremere que vous contrôlez peut déplacer 1 de ses points de sang vers cette carte. Vous pouvez l'incliner durant votre phase d'influence pour déplacer tous les compteurs sur cette carte vers un Tremere dans votre région incontrôlée. N'importe quel serviteur peut brûler cette carte en action Ⓓ ; les Malkaviens reçoivent +1 en discrétion durant cette action.

es.name: Palacio del Agua Anif, Austria
es.card_text:
Lugar único.
Durante tu fase heril, un Tremere que controles puede pasar 1 de sangre de sí mismo a esta carta. Gírala durante tu fase de influencia para pasar todas las fichas de esta carta a un Tremere de tu zona incontrolada. Cualquier siervo puede quemar esta carta con una acción Ⓓ; los Malkavian obtienen +1 de sigilo en esa acción.

card_text:
Unique location.
During your master phase, a Tremere you control can move 1 blood from themselves to this card. Lock during your influence phase to move all counters on this card to a Tremere in your uncontrolled region. Any minion can burn this card as a Ⓓ action; Malkavians get +1 stealth during that action.

text: Can only receive blood from one Tremere on any given turn. [RTR 19960221]

name: Wasserschloss Anif, Austria

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock during your discard phase to move a card from your ash heap to the bottom of your library.
name: Waste Management Operation

card_text:
Requires a Black Hand vampire. Only usable when attempting to block a Ⓓ action.
+1 intercept.
flavor_text:
One who is prepared and waits for the unprepared will be victorious.
Sun Tzu, "The Art of War"
name: Watch Commander

card_text:
Master: watchtower. Requires a ready Seraph.
Put this card in play. You may use a master phase action to draw three cards (discard down to your hand size afterward). Burn this card if another watchtower enters play.
name: Watchtower: Chosen are Called

card_text:
Master: watchtower. Requires a ready Seraph.
Put this card in play. During your discard phase, you may lock this card to unlock any ready Black Hand vampire. Burn this card if another watchtower enters play.
name: Watchtower: Four Ride Forth

card_text:
Requires a Seraph. Watchtower.
In this referendum, each ready Seraph gets 2 additional votes. If this referendum is successful, put this card in play. Lock this card to move 1 blood from the blood bank to a Sabbat vampire in your ready region or your uncontrolled region (not usable during combat). Burn this card if another watchtower enters play.
name: Watchtower: Greatest Fall

card_text:
Master: watchtower. Requires at least one Gehenna card in play and a ready Seraph.
Black Hand vampires get +1 stealth and may strike for 2R damage. A ready Black Hand vampire you control may lock to cancel a Gehenna card as it is played. During your unlock phase, burn X pool or burn this card, where X is the number of Gehenna cards in play (minimum of 1). Burn this card if another watchtower enters play.
name: Watchtower: The Wolves Feed

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready non-Sterile Follower of Set with capacity above 4.
Put this card in play; it becomes a 1-capacity Follower of Set. You may search your library (shuffle afterward), ash heap or hand for a Discipline card and place it on this vampire (pay cost as normal). This vampire is not considered unique, must hunt this turn and is the same sect as the acting Follower of Set.

text: Is not a vampire in the ash heap (eg. {Possession} cannot be played on it). [LSJ 20020115]
If moved to the uncontrolled region (eg. by {Banishment}), it continues to be a vampire and can be influenced. [RTR 19990712]

name: Waters of Duat

card_text:
This is a +1 stealth action.
[dem] Ⓓ Lock an ally.
[DEM] Lock all allies.
flavor_text:
To see clearly is poety, prophecy, and religion -- all in one.
John Ruskin

text: [DEM] Is directed at all Methusalah controlling an ally. [LSJ 20080809-1] [KOT 20081119]

name: Wave of Insanity

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Wave of Lethargy each round.
[qui] Maneuvers and presses cost the opposing vampire 1 additional blood this round.
[QUI] As above, and strike cards cost the opposing vampire 1 additional blood this round.

text: Card text was changed in 2007, previous rulings do not apply. [ANK 20200408-1]

name: Wave of Lethargy

card_text:
Unique weapon.
Strike: 2R aggravated damage. Not usable against a vampire with Celerity [cel], an ally, or a retainer. Burn after use.

text: Does not burn if combat ends before it resolves (eg. if the opponent uses a "strike: combat ends"). [LSJ 20001127-2] [LSJ 20010806-1] [LSJ 19981006]

name: Waxen Poetica

card_text:
[qui] Strike: burn one Master Discipline card on the opposing vampire (Remove excess blood).
[QUI] As above, and the opposing vampire also takes one damage.
name: Weakness

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined on the first round.
[tha] Both combatants and each of their retainers take 1 unpreventable damage before range is determined each round. A vampire may play only one Weather Control each combat.
[THA] As above, but the amount of damage inflicted increases by 1 in each subsequent round.

text: Damage is environmental. [RTR 19970630]
The damage is inflicted even if combat is subsequently ended before range (eg. by {Mariel, Lady Thunder}, {Alpha Glint}). [LSJ 19971110] [ANK 20190725]

The minion can play other pre-range effects before applying the damage and opening the damage prevention window, but he has to apply damage before passing the opportunity to play effects to the next player. [ANK 20170930]
Both minions have the opportunity to play prevention and non-prevention pre-range effects during the damage prevention window. [ANK 20170930]

name: Weather Control

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card in play in your uncontrolled region with 3 training counters. During your unlock phase, burn 1 training counter from this card. You can burn counters from no more than two recruits each unlock phase. When the last training counter is burned, move this card to your ready region; it becomes a 3-capacity non-unique Independent Assamite with Celerity [cel], Obfuscate [obf], Potence [pot], Quietus [qui] and 3 blood who is Blood cursed.

text: It is not an action to put a vampire in play. [LSJ 20060616-2]

name: Web of Knives Recruit

card_text:
Master.
Put this card in play with 10 nightmare counters. Ravnos get +1 bleed and +1 strength and do not hunt as normal. A Ravnos may steal a blood from another Ravnos as a +1 stealth hunt action. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, he or she may move a nightmare counter from this card to a Ravnos. If this card has no counters, each Ravnos burns a blood for each nightmare counter or is burned, then burn this card and the counters. Only one Week of Nightmares may be played in a game.

text: Ravnos can target a Ravnos with no blood with the +1 stealth hunt action. [RTR 20010711]
Cannot choose to target a vampire when using another non-standard hunt action (eg. {Abactor}). [LSJ 20090606] [ANK 20190707]

name: Week of Nightmares

card_text:
Master: unique location.
+1 hand size. During your unlock phase, a ready Black Hand vampire you control gains 1 blood. Any Assamite can burn this card as a Ⓓ action that costs 1 pool.
name: Weeping Stone

card_text:
[aus][ser] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed limited).
[AUS][SER] Only usable as a Ⓓ action is announced. If this action is successful, put a corruption counter on a minion controlled by the target Methuselah (after resolving the action).

text: [AUS][SER] Cards and effects that can be played "as the action is announced" (and only them) can be played before it. [ANK 20190425]
[AUS][SER] If the action targets multiple Methusalah, you choose one minion, which must be controlled by one of the target Methusalah. [ANK 20180515]

name: Weigh the Heart

fr.name: Canne lestée
fr.card_text:
Seulement utilisable avant l'étape de manœuvre durant le premier round de combat.
Mettez cette carte avec 5 compteurs dessus sur ce serviteur ; elle devient un équipement arme de mêlée qui peut frapper : force+1 points de dégâts. Pour chaque point de dégâts infligé par cette frappe (même prévenus), brûlez 1 compteur de cette carte. Brûlez cette carte si elle n'a plus de compteurs. Un serviteur ne peut en avoir qu'un seul exemplaire.

es.name: Bastón lastrado
es.card_text:
Sólo utilizable antes de determinar la distancia durante el primer asalto del combate.
Ponle esta carta a este siervo y pon 5 fichas en esta carta; se convierte en un arma blanca (equipo) que puede atacar: fuerza+1 de daño. Por cada punto de daño infligido por este ataque (incluso si es prevenido), quema 1 ficha de esta carta. Quema esta carta cuando no tenga fichas. Un siervo puede tener sólo un ejemplar de esta carta.

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat.
Put this card with 5 counters on it on this minion; it becomes a melee weapon equipment that can strike: strength+1 damage. For each damage inflicted by this strike (even if prevented), burn 1 counter from this card. Burn this card if it has no counters. A minion can have only one Weighted Walking Stick.

text: If the damage is reduced (eg. {Nephandus}), the corresponding token is not burned (contrary to prevented damage). [LSJ 20100519]
Full damage is applied if there are any counter left, even just 1. [ANK 20201229-2]

name: Weighted Walking Stick

card_text:
Equipment.
During any Methuselah's unlock phase, you may look at the top card of that Methuselah's library. If that card is a master card, this vampire may burn 1 blood to burn that card.

text: Once in play, can be equipped from the minion it's on (rulebook action) by another minion that does not meet the requirements. [ANK 20180719-3]

name: Weirding Stone

card_text:
[pot] Strike: 4R damage; only usable at long range. Not usable first round of combat.

flavor_text:
We shall discuss your breach of the Masquerade later...
Tusk, The Talebearer, Nosferatu

name: Well-Aimed Car

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a Laibon.
Put this card on this Laibon. If his or her capacity is 5 or more, he or she unlocks. Once each combat, this Laibon may prevent 1 non-aggravated damage from the opponent's strike. A minion can have only one Well-Marked.
name: Well-Marked

card_text:
Unique mortal with 3 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed.
Wendell can strike: 2R damage. He inflicts +2 damage with melee weapons. He gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. He can enter combat with any minion as a Ⓓ action. If Wendell has 2 or less life during your unlock phase, he gains 1 life. During your unlock phase, Wendell inflicts 2 unpreventable damage on a ready vampire you control.

text: Additional damage inherits all of the properties of the base damage. [TOM 19960225]

name: Wendell Delburton

card_text:
Unique werewolf with 3 life. 3 strength, 0 bleed.
Werewolf Pack is not affected by damage from melee weapons.
flavor_text:
Has the red wolf trotted east and east and east,
Far from the far, far other end of the day,
To fear a few fangs?
D.H. Lawrence, "The Red Wolf"
name: Werewolf Pack

card_text:
[nec] Move a library card from your ash heap to your hand (discard afterward).
[NEC] As above, but with +1 stealth.

text: The card to retrieve must be announced when declaring the action. [LSJ 20010627]

name: Whispers from the Dead

card_text:
Unique Master.
Put this card in play. Every Nosferatu burns 1 additional blood to unlock during his or her controller's unlock phase. Any Methuselah can burn this card by burning 1 pool and spending four transfers during his or her influence phase.
flavor_text:
And the bastard childer of Nosferatu still roam the dark places of the Earth hunting their favored cousins...
Tusk, The Talebearer, Nosferatu
name: Whispers of the Nictuku

card_text:
[abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played.
[abo] Frenzy. Only usable before range is determined on the first round. During this combat, the opposing vampire cannot use maneuvers to maneuver to close range and cannot use presses to continue combat.
[ABO] As above, and this vampire gets an optional maneuver this round.

text: [abo] [REFLEX] Any frenzy card that targets/selects/chooses/affects the minion when played, is considered being played on the minion. [LSJ 20051113]
[abo] [REFLEX] Any frenzy card that targets/selects/chooses/affects the minion when played, is considered being played on the minion. [LSJ 20051113]

name: Whistling Up the Beast

card_text:
Transient.
During your next discard phase, you must burn this card, and you may either burn a vampire in torpor or, by locking a ready werewolf ally you control or discarding a White Nights Massacre from your hand, burn all vampires in torpor.
name: White Nights Massacre

card_text:
Weapon.
2R aggravated damage each strike. If White Phosphorus Grenade is used at close range, the minion with this equipment takes 1 aggravated damage. Burn after use.
flavor_text:
The sky is darkening like a stain;
Something is going to fall like rain,
And it won't be flowers.
W.H. Auden, "The Witnesses"

name: White Phosphorus Grenade

fr.name: Panorama élargi
fr.card_text:
Triviale.
Mettez cette carte en jeu. Vous pouvez utiliser 1 transfert pour piocher 1 carte de votre crypte et retirer ensuite une carte de crypte dans votre région incontrôlée de la partie. Vous pouvez utiliser 4 transferts pour brûler cette carte et gagner 2 points de réserve.

es.name: Perspectiva más amplia
es.card_text:
Nimiedad.
Pon esta carta en juego. Puedes usar 1 transferencia para robar 1 carta de tu cripta y luego retirar del juego una carta de cripta de tu zona incontrolada. Puedes usar 4 transferencias para quemar esta carta y ganar 2 de reserva sanguínea.

card_text:
Trifle.
Put this card in play. You can use 1 transfer to draw 1 card from your crypt and then remove a crypt card in your uncontrolled region from the game. You can use 4 transfers to burn this card and gain 2 pool.

text: Cards removed from the game are public. [LSJ 20080314]

name: Wider View

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card on the acting Ahrimane. This Ahrimane gets +1 strength and -1 stealth and gets an optional maneuver each combat. He or she cannot use equipment and cannot have retainers (any retainers on this vampire are burned). A vampire can have only one The Wildebeest.
name: The Wildebeest

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready primogen.
Put this card on the acting primogen. During the referendum of a political action, this primogen can burn 1 blood to gain 1 vote. This primogen can burn this card to play a card that requires a prince as if he or she were a prince. This primogen can burn this card when a prince enters torpor to receive (and contest) the same title as that prince. A vampire can have only 1 Will of the Council.
name: Will of the Council

card_text:
[chi] Allocate X+1 points among one or more minions. Each point represents -1 intercept for that minion this action.
[CHI] Only usable as the action is announced. Choose X-1 allies or younger vampires. The chosen minions cannot block or play reaction cards this action.

text: [CHI] Cards and effects that can be played "as the action is announced" (and only them) can be played before it. [ANK 20190425]

name: Will-o'-the-Wisp

card_text:
This equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment while in play. Unique.
The vampire with this location has superior Dementation [DEM]. At the end of your master phase, if you did not play a master card from your hand this phase, this vampire burns 1 blood.
flavor_text:
I am glad that it is old and big. I myself am of an old family, and to live in a new house would kill me.
Bram Stoker, "Dracula"

text: May be put on any minion if the controller changes. If the new controller has no minions, it is burned. [RTR 19960112]

name: Winchester Mansion

card_text:
[tha] Strike: dodge.
[THA] Strike: dodge with an additional strike: dodge this round.
name: Wind Dance

card_text: [FLIGHT] Only usable when another minion you control enters combat with a minion without flight. Lock this minion. In that combat, this minion may make a hand or melee weapon strike (with or without a strike card) on the opposing minion during normal strike resolution (as if at close range). Dodge will avoid this strike, and damage prevention effects can treat this as a strike from an opposing minion. This minion may be the target of effects that inflict damage or steal blood as a retainer could be.
name: Winged Second

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card on this acting Akunanse. If this action is successful, unlock the acting vampire at the end of the turn. While this Akunanse is ready, your hand size is one card larger. A vampire may have only one Wise Spider.
flavor_text:
To travel is to see. To travel is to learn.
Hasani, Akunanse
name: Wise Spider

card_text:
[ani] Strike: 1R damage.
[thn] Strike: hand strike. Place this card on the opposing minion. The minion with this card has -1 strength. Burn this card during his or her controller's next discard phase.
[THN] As [thn] above, and the minion with this card cannot play cards that require any Disciplines.
name: Withering

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock to give any minion +1 intercept for the current action. If that minion doesn't successfully block the action, burn 1 pool after the action resolves.

card_text:
[pro] For the remainder of the round, this vampire's hand damage is aggravated.
[PRO] Press.
flavor_text:
How cheerfully he seems to grin,
How neatly spread his claws...
Lewis Carroll, "Alice in Wonderland"

text: [pro] Must be played before strike resolution (and damage prevention) in order to affect the current strike [RTR 19960112]

name: Wolf Claws

card_text:
Animal with 2 life.
[ani] When the minion with this retainer is in combat, the opposing minion takes 1 damage during strike resolution (if the range is close).
[ANI] As above, but Wolf Companion has 3 life.
flavor_text:
It is you -- my equal, my companion and close friend.
Psalms 55:13 (NLT)

text: The damage is neither environmental nor considered done by the minion it is on: it is damage done by the retainer. [ANK 20180612]

Damage is inflicted even against a dodge. A "strike: combat ends" ends combat before damage is applied, as will a combattant going to torpor during first strike. [RTR 19941109] [TOM 19951216] [PIB 20140324] [ANK 20200422]
The discipline level used to recruit it decides which version it is (inferior or superior). This does not change once it is in play. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20180612]
It is neither a mortal nor a monster. [ANK 20200203-2] [LSJ 20060515]
Does not gain additional strikes from its owner. [RTR 19941109]

name: Wolf Companion

card_text:
Melee weapon.
Strike: strength damage. If more than 1 damage is inflicted on an opposing vampire by this weapon in a given combat, that vampire is sent to torpor. In that case, this card is transferred to that vampire, and he or she doesn't unlock as normal during the unlock phase as long as he or she remains in torpor.

text: If placed on a minion that cannot have equipment, the Stake is burned. The "does not unlock as normal" effect still applies. [LSJ 19980831]
The "does not unlock as normal" effect continues to apply if the Stake is burned or moved. [LSJ 19980831]
The "does not unlock as normal" effect is redundant with being infernal. If the minion is infernal, his controller can still pay a pool to unlock him. [LSJ 20050114]

name: Wooden Stake

card_text:
Requires an anarch.
[dom] Ⓓ Burn half the blood counters on an uncontrolled minion in your prey's uncontrolled region (round down).
[obf] +1 stealth action. Ⓓ Burn a location.
[vic] Ⓓ Burn 4 blood from a ready, titled, non-Anarch vampire.
name: The World's a Canvas

card_text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until your next discard phase.
Requires at least one other Gehenna card in play. Put 10 counters on this card. Burn 1 counter whenever another Gehenna card is put in play. A vampire whose capacity is greater than X is treated as if his or her capacity is X (minimum of 1), where X is the number of counters on this card.

text: Ceils the vampire's capacity, including effects that have changed it, to X. {Orun} adds to that X, or the vampire's capacity if it is lower, for cards played by other players. [LSJ 20051205]
When a vampire is influenced, the excess blood drains off before entering contest (if any) and before playing "as played/as he enters play" effects. [LSJ 20100902]
The "other Gehenna cards in play" requirement is only checked when playing the card. [PIB 20121031]

name: Wormwood

card_text:
Requires an Inner Circle member.
Choose a ready justicar. If the referendum is successful, put this card on that justicar. The justicar loses his or her title, and his or her capacity decreases by 1. (A vampire's capacity cannot go below 1.)
name: Wrath of the Inner Circle

card_text:
Equipment.
The vampire with this equipment is considered a Camarilla vampire.

text: The effect is not optional. [RTR 19980707]

Is a temporary effect that overrides the underlying sect. The most recent override takes precendence. It stays active if another effect changes the underlying sect, like using the default action to become Anarch. [LSJ 20100811] [ANK 20190619]

If the target changes sect to a sect inappropriate for his title, he loses its benefit until his sect is appropriate. He immediately yields the title if it is contested or he receives a new one. [LSJ 20060904]

name: Writ of Acceptance

card_text:
[dem] Reduce a bleed against you by 2.
[DEM] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. This vampire gets +4 votes against the referendum.
name: Wrong and Crosswise

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Only usable when a vampire successfully hunts. Put this card on that vampire. During this vampire's minion phase, he or she must hunt, even if at capacity. Any vampire may burn this card as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.

text: A hunt is not successful if no blood is gained, even if the hunt action is still successful. [LSJ 20050720-2]

name: XTC-Laced Blood

card_text:
Master: unique location. Requires a ready Sabbat vampire.
When a political action is successful, before the referendum, lock this card and a ready unlocked Sabbat vampire you control to have that vampire enter combat with the acting vampire. If the acting vampire is still ready at the end of combat, the Sabbat vampire takes 2 damage, and the referendum is conducted as normal.

text: Damage inflicted at the end of combat is environmental. [RTR 19970630]
If the acting minion is not ready after the combat, then the action ends and no referendum is conducted. [LSJ 20060902]
If the acting vampire gets out of torpor immediately (eg. {Warsaw Station}), the action ends and no referendum is conducted. [LSJ 20090325-1]

The effect is applied after cards that are played "at the end of the round (eg. {Disarm}) or "when combat would end". If a combat ends and a new combat would begin, the damage is applied between the two combats and the referendum is conducted after all the combats if the acting vampire is still ready. [ANK 20180910-1] [LSJ 20060903]

name: Yawp Court

card_text: Choose one or more Methuselahs who are not chosen for any other Year of Fortune in play. If this referendum is successful, put this card into play. Each chosen Methuselah gets +1 hand size. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.
name: Year of Fortune

card_text:
Unique location.
When a ready Assamite you control is the target of a Ⓓ action or is chosen by the acting Methuselah in the terms of a referendum, you can lock this location to unlock the acting minion and have the action or referendum fail. Only usable as the Ⓓ action is announced or during the polling step of the referendum before votes and ballots are cast.
name: Yoruba Shrine

card_text:
Unique mortal with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed.
The Young Bloods can burn 2 blood from a locked vampire with a capacity less than 8 as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. If a vampire controlled by another Methuselah burns the Young Bloods in combat or as an action, he or she gains 2 blood.

text: They may use their built-in action against a vampire with only 1 blood. If successful, that vampire burns his 1 blood. [LSJ 20070213]
If the target of their ability unlocks and the action is not blocked, it is successful but has no effect. [LSJ 20070411] [LSJ 20090514]

name: Young Bloods

card_text: Before range is determined, put this card on this minion. This card represents an equipment card and doesn't count as a combat card while in play. This equipment is a weapon, gun. Bearer takes 1 damage during strike resolution when striking with this gun, but only once each combat. This card is kept as normal equipment and is not discarded after combat.

text: Damage done to the bearer is environmental. [LSJ 19970801]
No damage is done to the bearer if he does not strike with the gun (eg. if it is destroyed with first strike). [LSJ 20100310]
